review_body: Hotel Charly overachieves for its 2-star category. Arriving at the Central Station in Milan, I walked to the hotel, less than ten minutes away. The neighborhood looked a bit dodgy, but when I turned onto the side street for the hotel, it was quiet and charming. The Charly has a bit of an old-world feel to it, a bit lived-in but not at all shabby. The room was small but nicely decorated, with a all window that looked out over the garden. The breakfast buffer was minimal, but considering the price of the room, it seemed quite generous. Tram, bus and metro are all within a short walk, making the sights easy to visit. Good wifi (but you have to get a new ID every day). I would gladly stay here again.
hotelName:
2    Charly
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel was very nice, clean, good location, nice staff....i liked everything.Just one thing bothers me. I reserved the hotel through booking.com. Paying for one night on my credit card has been blocked. I paid by cash in the hotel. After 3 weeks money on my credit card is still not available. I have one question, is this means double pay??? I wrote several letters to the hotel, but the answer has not received
hotelName:
2    Charly
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here for past 2 nights and everything was good. Our room was on the 1st level with a balcony looking out to the garden. There is no elevator so if u have heavy luggages, can try to request for rooms on the ground level. Room and bathroom were clean. Our room does not have a noise problem, maybe because it was facing the garden. Just a note that there is a weird and foul smell on the bathing towels. Wifi will be provided if you ask the recep for it. The account lasts only 1 day. So if you are staying more than 1 night, u have to ask again. Our room is on the block without the recep and has 1 gate locked and 1 door locked at night so security is good. Staff were friendly and as we had early checkout on the 2nd morning, we asked for some breads to bring on train and they gladly provided us with croissants and cereals. :) Breakfast buffet was good with croissants, breads, tarts, cakes, cereals, milk, cappuccino, orange juice etc. Location was also ok, 10 mins away from the station. Overall stay was good. :)
hotelName:
2    Charly
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Mid Sept, weather was cool and nice so no need for air conditioner. Picked room overlooking garden. Much quieter. Must take note that this hotel has no lift. If u have have luggage/s can be difficult. No porter service. DIY. Best book ground floor if have heavy luggage. Not very near railway station but walking distance. Surrounding not that great. Hotel is clean, room small n clean. Bathroom is ok for me cos I m small built but if you are big then can be uncomfortable. Continental b'fast ok
hotelName:
2    Charly
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed here the Saturday night of the weekend of the nearby Italian Formula 1 Grand Prix so the price, like those of every hotel in Milan that weekend, was a lot higher than usual but it was still reasonable compared to other hotels. The room was basic, clean and comfortable (with a large bathroom) and well met our need for a place near the Milano Centrale station (about 500 mts away) to spend the night. The staff were friendly courteous and helpful. The breakfast was ok but nothing special.
hotelName:
2    Charly
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Booked almost last minute due to recommendations but could not believe the excellent price, so expected some faults somewhere. However, the hotel was actually better than I expected. It is located on a residential street, very few blocks away from the central station. Staff is excellent and friendly. Room was of good size, with a lovely balcony and very good double glazing (once bathroom and bedroom windows were shut one would hear no noise from the outside). Breakfast was simple but sufficient and one could sit in the lovely garden. It was just like staying at a house in central Milan. Nearby restaurants were good. Only small fault was that I could hear people talking in the corridor and in the room next door but nothing that disturbed my sleep. It was exceptional considering the price.
hotelName:
2    Charly
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My partner and I stayed here for just one night during our brief stay in Milan. It is just a few blocks from the central train station, which is one of the main reasons for choosing this location. We had a nice room on the ground floor which opened onto a small balcony and the garden area. It would have been much nicer except for the noisy young couple who stayed in a room near to us, we heard everything until the early hours of the morning through the air-conditioning, (which seemed to have a direct connection to the next room). I resorted to putting in ear plugs to get to sleep. This is hardly the hotels fault, although perhaps an oversight with the design of the air con.Breakfast was nice, and service was fine. Was good value for money, and our stay would have been much better if not for the couple next door who just couldn't keep quiet.
hotelName:
2    Charly
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Housed in an old building with no elevator, Charly is still a very nice play to stay while passing through Milan. It is minutes from Milano Centrale Railway Station and a short drive to Linate Airport. It is also very near the famous shopping district of Buenos Aires and Lima Square. Nice shops, decent prices and great restaurants patronised by locals.The front desk was manned by the knowledgeable and helpful Mr Marco who pointed us to the Metro (to visit the Duomo) and also advised on some nice italian restaurants...
hotelName:
2    Charly
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at this little but cosy hotel just for one night as we we're going to a concert at La Scala Theatre. It has a very convenient location as it's close to Milan Stazione Centrale, corso Buenos Aires, famous for its nice shops and just a 30 minutes walk from La Scala. Unfortunately the weather was not so nice (it snowed on March 17th!!) but this hotel is cleaner, more welcoming and affordable than you would expect from a 2 star hotel. It has a nice breakfast included in the price (but there's no ham or eggs or other non-sweet food).The only negative point is that there's no lift/elevator for disabled people. I highly recommend it.
hotelName:
2    Charly
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Terrible beds.I'm not ok with very soft beds but mattresses in Hotel Charly are extremely old & hard, you can feel all metal springs with your body. As hotels usually invoice you for overnights, I'm sure that good quality sleep is MUST for hotel service. We couldn't sleep normally & our weekend was spoiled because of that. Breakfast was also very poor. You can definitely find better hotels for the same price. The only good thing was good location - just 5 min by foot from Central Station.
hotelName:
2    Charly
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here for one night sort of transit. It's a perfect location. Hotel staff is very friendly and helped me with my luggage issues the day after (after checkout). It's a characteristic old hotel with old classic rooms. In the middle of the center (stazione centrale area) but still quiet. I had a very pleasant stay and sleep. It's a cheap hotel so don't expect world class amenities. But for the price it's really number one! Good breakfast also. A really good choice!It's walking distance from Centrale. Also close to subway. If you visit Milano for shopping it's not best location as Centrale is still some subway stops from the main shopping area. But even then this hotel is still a good option for it's price/quality and near subway stations. Also plenty of nice restaurants around.
hotelName:
2    Charly
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location of the hotel is convenient, close to the main train station, and about a half hour walk from the Duomo. The room was clean, comfortable and had a little balcony Lovely relaxing garden to rear of hotel - a little oasis in the city centre. Breakfast was good. Very good value for money, would recommend! elnavermaak
hotelName:
2    Charly
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Pros: a very good location - 5 min walk from the Milan Central Railway Station and 5 min from the Lima Metro station, some rooms are facing a nice gardenCons: extremely hard and narrow beds, mosquitos in the room, a tiny shower, poor breakfast, unfriendly staff speaking little English.The hotel management seems to save money on you instead of earning money
hotelName:
2    Charly
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good hotel, clean and not that far from city, although the metro is quite near. Only problem I had with hotel, is the fact that if you don't have a laptop, you don't have access to internet. Hotels where they have a computer for the use of the guests, make things much easier. Nearest internet cafe quite far.
hotelName:
2    Charly
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We are a couple and choose the double room with ensuite. We found rhe staff friendly and it to be a great location near the centrale train station and the main shopping street of buenos aires. Free wifi, air con, breakfast included and nice quiet location. Would recommend!
hotelName:
2    Charly
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Poor breakfast. No juice. Fruit stock low. Not amazing quality food. Cold eggs. Lack of staff to ask for help. Reported lack of juice and not replenished. The staff on duty are friendly.The room was big. Nice shower.
hotelName:
3    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good and tidy hotel. Good breakfast. Easy to get to the centre of Milano. Busline 50 to centre other side of the road to hotel stops in front of hotel. To consider u cant buy bustickets in de bus at the hotel you can buy one way tickets for 2 euro. In the centre of Milano you can buy 3 day tickets in tobacco shops for 12 euro.
hotelName:
3    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good, comfortable option with great service and staff, nice food. The hotel is located quite away from the Milan central, in what appears to be a business/office district. It is best reachable by taxi (which are quite expensive in Milan) but also reachable by bus. The hotel offers smooth check-in, check-out experience with excellent staff manning the front desks. They speak good English, are very courteous and eager to make your stay comfortable.The rooms are spacious, comfortable and well equipped for a business stay. You get a wide, comfortable bed, with lots of cushions and a comfortable mattress with neat, clean linen. You get a small, comfortable couch and a working desk. There is a spacious covered wardrobe along with an electronic safe. The room has a nicely equipped mini bar, electric kettle, a work desk and enough space around. The bathroom is good, clean and well appointed.The interiors are quiet and offer good noise insulation from the street outside (except for the occasional sports bike/car vrooms; after all it's Italy).The staff is courteous and helpful. I needed assistance with the door lock, electricity trip-off, an iron and ironing board - all of which was attended to promptly and with a smile.The breakfast buffet spread was also very nice. They have a small splash pool and tables besides it with live radio - making it quite inviting and lively. A lot of office like the Vodafone building, Ericsson, Huawei are all within a walking distance from the hotel making it a convenient option to stay. There is a superstore nearby, also a McDonalds and several more eating places too. Overall, it is a good place to stay and I recommend it highly.
hotelName:
3    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My family and I had a very pleasant stay at the hotel. The rooms and surroundings were clean and well kept. The inclusive breakfast was well spread and tasty too. We'd certainly consider staying here in the future too.
hotelName:
3    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed there for three nights hotel is clean but very far from city center inly way for new comer to commute is tram its station was not very far but no entertainment no place of interest near by tram is not running all night and expensive to go to airport no good public transportation to airport only taxi
hotelName:
3    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good location, helpful team and a good breakfast. Room comfortable, no need to change towels or toiletries daily though. Would be nice to have information about area, public transport in the room. Lots to see and do in the area, recommend a visit to milan.
hotelName:
3    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good value for payed money! Clean, all necessary things are in the room, free parking, good wi-fi and breakfast. To reach Milan you will need to use public transport (tram ~25-30 minutes) as there are a lot of zones traffico limitato in it.
hotelName:
3    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: found this hotel close to my families home and was very pleasantly surprised .One very useful facility was the car park on site it can be difficult to park in Milan this was easy and included in the price of the room.
hotelName:
3    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Booked standard double room. The room was exactly what I expected given the prce paid for staying 2 nights. Clean and spacious room and bathroom. Modern bathroom. Wifi was included along with free secure parking in the Hotel underground car park. Options for breakfast were good and typical of what would be expected in Italy. Our original room had problems with heating and so was cold on arrival. After letting the reception desk know and them trying to increase the temperature from there end with no success, they moved/upgraded us to a suite room. Reception desk were very helpful in advising us of local restaruarnts to eat at and on the transport routes available to get us into the main centre of Milan. They were also helpful in letting us leave our bags in a secure area after checkout on the last day whilst we explored Milan before driving out of Milan. Very good service and hotel for the price paid. Would recommend to anyone wanting to travel to Milan that doesn't mind travelling to the centre for around 40mins via bus/tram. The No 14 tram located 5 mins walk from the hotel takes you just outside the main sqaure infront of the Duomo.
hotelName:
3    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: very clean hotel with nice design in the rooms. Slight away from the center of city ~40 minutes with tram that is round the corner. The sound insulation within hotel was not so good as you could here everything happening in the corridor. You could also be mistaken that it was your room opened or closed, furthermore the slippers must be requested from the reception !Overall the personnel was very polite and eager to assist. Notice that reception had also tram tickets that was very helpful as the station is near by.
hotelName:
3    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: the hotel was close to the office, which was big advantage. The rooms were nice, a standard kind, however, it was but strange, as the key to my room, was broken, so they exchange it, and I have to use the regular keys instead of the card. also my hair dryer did not work.the breakfast was ok, but have experience better.
hotelName:
3    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Just near Milan entrance in the middle of a business area.This 4 stars hotel is perfect for a business trip with great rooms and great breakfast.Of course I would not have chosen this hotel for a familly weekend to discover the center or Milan. But for a business trip
hotelName:
3    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here a couple of times recently on Business. Used to be a Holiday Inn but has been taken over by the Chinese owned IH Hotel Group who own a number of Hotels throughout Italy. Fairly Standard Business Hotel with clean modern rooms, decent breakfast (although green beans alongside the bacon and scrambled egg!). Kettle provided in the room to make tea or coffee.Public Transport nearby to take you into the centre of Milan in about 40 minutes.
hotelName:
3    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed two nights and at the end of our journey we came back again.Very clean. Personnel extremely helpful especially Valentina at breakfast. As I couldNot eat much due to an allergy she made sure I had a special breackfast
hotelName:
3    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A wonderful one night stay in Milan with our family. Our connecting rooms were clean and comfortable. Best of all was the safe underground parking. Location conveniently near a bus stop. Would definitely recommend.
hotelName:
3    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: By price, this hotels can give you better offer than other, similar Milan Hotels, because of the distance from downtown and attraction level around the Hotel. I mean, on foot, not so much to see around the Hotel as it's more like an outskirt office area of the city. There is a tram (Nr. 14) goes to downtown (Duomo) 21 stations, fro the single price of EUR 1.5 (Bigletto urbano - you can by at near kiosk, but not at the station). Hotel was fine, nicely furnitured, even the extra bed (couch) was with one affordable matrace built in. The air condition setting fixed, could not really set and turning off seemed to be impossible. And it was a bit noisy during the night.Cleaning service was excellent and kind. Breakfast with wide variation of cakes and excellent fresh pastries was fine. Capuccino and omlet - extra charge - it's a pitty. Reception desk, check in, check out was smooth and proper. Parking is free (regular price could be from EUR 16/day in Milan) inside the undergound garage. Perosnally some spa and fitness opportunities were missing for me.
hotelName:
3    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Visited on 14th of July. We are in now Itlay. No adapter. They had switch gor adapter. Other country’s hotels offered sdaptrr and iron. No cream. No iron. Receptionist was not even nice. Room was big and clean.Breakfast was ok too.
hotelName:
3    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Location of hotel is OK. Bus stop or tram station are only a few minutes by walking. You can arrive in 30 minutes, from the hotel to center of Milano. Room is very comfortable: Clean and big room, there is no carpet, no dust, big and comfort bed, good tv, etc. Shower and toilet are clean and good.Reception was good and they try to help you. All of the employees are good. Breakfast is very good, there are olive also!
hotelName:
3    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: good hotel outside the centre of Milan ( about 10 minutes by taxi from the centre ). Staff friendly and helpful, rooms good and well equipped ( TV signal not great ) comfy bed and good shower. Breakfast good selection although the "English Breakfast" was not great.Overall good hotel just outside the centre of Milan.
hotelName:
3    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I have used the hotel for bussiness purposes - so I can not say anything bad about the location, which is a bit outside the center of the city. However, with the tram that runs in front of the hotel, the city center is easy to reach. Good if you travel by car as the hotel has underground parking which was for free.The internet connection of excellent.The room that I booked (superior one) was spacious and comfortable. Breakfast was fine - with good choises, but nothing extraordinary.
hotelName:
3    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice hotel with a very good breakfast. A pity the bar closes already at 22:00, a bar with snacks should be open until midnight. Rooms where clean with a shower. Was there for business. Also the environment was nice for a short walk.
hotelName:
3    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is almost perfectly situated from my work here in Milan. The office is within easy walking distance, so I would not stay anywhere else. The rooms are great, large, comfortable, very clean and tidy. Bathroom good with all the facilities you could wish for. Staff are consistently good (this is not my first visit) and some very friendly and funny. Restaurant great for breakfast, but not so great in the evenings. If I was here on a holiday or with friends I would probably want to go out, but on my own, on a business trip, I just want some food in semi decent surroundings. Which you almost get.
hotelName:
3    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is a nice place to stay in Milano. The bad thing about this hotel is far from city center. But it is easy to go city center by bus or tram. The last stops of tram 14 across the street which goes to Duomo. The bus 50 which stops in front of the hotel goes to Sforza castle. Rooms are clean and wide. Breakfast is so so.
hotelName:
3    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel was good enough considering our short stay , this is more of a business hotel and it is not a close to get to turist áreas , however considering the dates we travel was the only one we could get with decent rate
hotelName:
3    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Room - ok: new, spacious, nice and clean. Breakfast - poor. Also not enough glasses/plates/cups provided, compared to a number of guests coming down for breakfast. So you can literally find yourself having no plate or a cup, and when you ask - they will bring you a plastic one!:)Location - far from centre but well communicated.Uber to the City Centre ~25eurTram no #64 takes you directly to the DuomoBus #50 takes you to Castello Storzesco and Metro
hotelName:
3    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This HOTEL is very good and the staff is helpfull. The breakfast is amazing. Congratulations for all services and for support. The only disadvantage is the location , is very far from the center. We are satisfied for your staying.
hotelName:
3    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I have stayed 4 or 5 times in the second half of 2017 for business purposesThe staff are all friendly and helpful. The rooms are big, clean and recently refurbished, the only issue if someone moves furniture in the room above it rattles the whole room, some soft pads on the chair and bed legs would not go a miss.and if you get a room opposite the lift it will be a bit to noise.
hotelName:
3    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: it was a pleasant stay , the rooms were nice and clean , the reception staff very friendly , the breakfast was very poor , always need to ask for croissants because they were never on the table , the staff were rude , never say good morning or anything ....besides that it is a nice hotel !
hotelName:
3    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Large and well equipped, very comfortable room, good breakfast selection. Quiet and close to the business district, not too far from good restaurants for evenings out.Definitely a place to consider to come back to Milan.
hotelName:
3    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Business travelers require a clean hotel,a comfortable bed,good wifi signal,fresh towels and a somewhat multilingual staff. That's Lorenteggio.Modern,fresh efficient. Decent breakfast.You will never fall in love with it,consider it as a good business deal.You get what you pay for.At €95 per night,for Milan,during fashion week,the rate was exceptional.
hotelName:
3    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here for 2nights. The reception team were so courteous and very helpful. I called earlier about directions to the hotel from Linate airport and their suggestions about options helpful. The area is quiet. There's a MacD not far off. A shopping mall is about 1.5 - 2miles away. I liked my room. Spotlessly clean and comfy beds. Spacious rooms. Sweet smelling corridors. Very friendly staff from reception team to house keeping staff. Complimentary tea and coffee provided in rooms plus kettle. Ironing facility available on request. A very good ribs restaurant about a Km from the hotel.
hotelName:
3    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A nice place for the money. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Rooms were clean and quiet. Not a lot of extra amenities but for the price, an excellent choice. Breakfast was included and had a great spread every morning. Very easy to get on a bus that goes straight to city center. Would stay here again.
hotelName:
3    iH Hotels Milano Lorenteggio
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Lorenzo contacted me by e-mail a few weeks prior the stay. Then he contacted me by Whatsapp offering help to arrive from the train station. Then he provided instructions on how to get there. He was waiting for us with a smile and showed us the premises. This place is amazing. There are 2 departments sharing a kitchen and a living room in each floor, in a traditional Milan old house converted to modern apartments very nicely decorated. Minibar is full and included. Kitchen has fruits, cereal, cookies, wine and other adult beverages included.Facilities are clean... really clean. Lorenzo could not be more helpful.Breakfast is included in a restaurant a couple of places down the street. Location is great. Walking distance from main attractions in Milan.
hotelName:
4    Moscova Luxury B&B
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We find something with our budget. First we think the serie8and quality was not be ok. But we find the best service as a new thing.best experience for us as a new in Milan. The staff service also better they provided us good information from the reception. They organized car with cheaper price to visit city tour in Milan.
hotelName:
4    Moscova Luxury B&B
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Your host Lorenzo is exactly that very energetic he ensures your comfort and wants are fulfilled, often topping up the fruit bowl or fridge with fresh supplies. Awesome stay I can highly recommend this B & B you won’t be disappointed. Great location.
hotelName:
4    Moscova Luxury B&B
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Energetic host Lorenzo owns three apartments that he has converted to B&Bs. This one features two guest rooms, a living/dining area, fully-stocked kitchen, great wi-fi (Lorenzo is a software engineer so he made sure the wifi works!), and all the drinks, snacks, fruit, and other edibles/imbibibles that you could ever desire. Staying here truly felt like my husband and I had our own place in Milan--the first night we were on our own, the second night there were other guests but we never saw them). The location is perfect for a scenic walk to the Brera, the Galleria, the Duomo, La Scala, Porta Nova, and all the other tourist attractions near the center, including--of all things--a giant Starbucks emporium that displays Howard Schultz's hubris (the coffee is the same as in the States, not in the same league as Italian coffee). As for the Breakfast part of this B&B, you can rustle up your own at the flat or use the vouchers Lorenzo dispenses for cappucini and cornetti at a small bar a few steps away. Finally: Lorenzo is most helpful arranging transport to the airport and recommending good restaurants. He even helped me find a good hairdresser.
hotelName:
4    Moscova Luxury B&B
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at Moscova Luxury B&B recently for 3 nights. Lorenzo is a great host, super friendly and helpful and his accommodation is great. He’s thought of everything. The free drinks and snacks are a definite bonus to this place, as is the location. The B and B is spotless and cleaned every day. Perfect for a city break in a beautiful place. Thank you Lorenzo, we had a wonderful stay.
hotelName:
4    Moscova Luxury B&B
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A must stay in Milan.Lorenzo was an amazing host checking that everything was ok nothing was too much trouble for him.Lovely clean apartment with such a variety of things to eat and drink the effort and thought that our host put into our stay was fantastic.Also the apartment was perfectly positioned.Thank you so much Lorenzo we will certainly be coming to stay again.
hotelName:
4    Moscova Luxury B&B
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had best time! Appartment is wonderful and in a great location. Lots of great food, wine and coffee to enjoy. Great host as well.couldnt ask for anything more.everything was spotless and of the highest quality. Fresh fruit available and juicer, 3 types of coffee machine, packed fridge and wine rack. What more could you ask for.
hotelName:
4    Moscova Luxury B&B
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This B&B is in a lovely building, is spotlessly clean, situated in a great (central) location and has so many thoughtful touches, it really is home from home. The room itself has a fully stocked mini fridge, little extras like a new toothbrush should you forget one & is beautifully designed. The bathroom area is a lovely space (it’s not big but it’s perfectly formed) with a large waterfall shower. The breakfast consists of coffee, croissant & orange juice as provided by the local cafe and is a nice way to start your day Italian style.There is also a lovely shared lounge and kitchen space which was great to come back to even after I had left my actual room as I was able to relax, make myself a cup of tea & sit and charge my phone. It’s a real home from home in a stunning Milanese building.I can not fault this lovely B&B which is so much more than that thanks to the host, the delightful Lorenzo who is so helpful and friendly. I wouldn’t want to stay anywhere else when in Milan!
hotelName:
4    Moscova Luxury B&B
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A wonderful surprise Home Apartments in the heart of Milan with all best qualities for a comfortable and enjoyable stay!Noone can complains choosing Moscova as the owner is an amazing guy ready to help you for everything you like to know.All facilities needed and even more than that you may find in the kitchen area,in the living room area and also in the bathroom.It feels like home and you really feel like going to your luxury apartment that you have in Milan.Excellent!!!
hotelName:
4    Moscova Luxury B&B
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: If i could give this higher than 5 stars, I would. Our experience with Lorenzo and Moscova Luxury B&B Milano was simply amazing. The B&B was beautifully decorated with all of the touches of home one could ask for when traveling abroad. Lorenzo thought of everything, from fruits, coffee, wine & beer, snacks and any amenity you might need. He was also extremely accommodating and happy to help with recommendations or reservations. I highly suggest Moscova if you are looking for accommodations in Milan. I would certainly come back here again!
hotelName:
4    Moscova Luxury B&B
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Moscova is a fantastic B&B conveniently located walking distance to central Milan. Lorenzo has done an amazing job of decorating the apartment with funky stylish artifacts and thought of every detail imaginable for the traveler's comfort. He was a joy to deal with, offering us helpful restaurant tips and incredibly responsive. Staying at Moscova turned our Milan stop into a highlight.
hotelName:
4    Moscova Luxury B&B
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Lorenzo was very helpful and had paid a lot of attention to the small details that make you stay a very pleasant one. I loved the room and the generous supply of snacks and coffee in the property. Highly recomendable
hotelName:
4    Moscova Luxury B&B
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Everything about our stay here was wonderful! Our host Lorenzo was always available to provide us with tips for restaurants, transport options etc and was always happy to answer any of our queries. Our bedroom was comfortable, spotlessly clean and well equipped with everything you could possibly need for an overnight stay. Complimentary fresh fruit, water, wine and beer was always available in the stylish shared kitchen/ sitting area. Our apartment was located in an excellent location within easy walking distance of the city centre. There were 2 metro stations close by, as well as numerous restaurants. We would definitely stay here again if we returned to Milan!
hotelName:
4    Moscova Luxury B&B
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very nice flat in the center of Milano. Everything was perfect and Lorenzo is a very good person ! Very clean bedroom with everything you need ...Next time, it’s sure, I’ll stay here but more than one night
hotelName:
4    Moscova Luxury B&B
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The apartment is in a great area just outside the centre and within walking distance of shops and restaurants.Lorenzo is a great host with excellent communication, he advised us where to eat locally and places to see in Milan itself The facilities were good with air-con, a fully stocked fridge ( food,beer,water ) and free wine if you wanted, all included in the rate .We also took advantage of the local parking for the car , also included in the rate ! ( you don’t need one in Milano ) Enjoyable three night stay Thanks Lorenzo
hotelName:
4    Moscova Luxury B&B
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a really nice stay in this bed and breakfast which is perfectly located (10 min walk to the duomo and really nice neighbourhood). Thanks to Lorenzo (the host) who gave us a very warm welcome and the best tips and avices about the places not to miss in the city. The rooms are clean, very well decorated, with large bathroom and comfy bed. The fridge was full of free snacks and there is large choice of wine and fresh fruits in the kitchen.The breakfast is included in the price and is in the bar right under the apartment.There is also a free parking really close to the bed and breakfast (a rare thing in Milano).We'll come back for sure !
hotelName:
4    Moscova Luxury B&B
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Unfortunately had only one night in this beautiful B&B in the Milan city center. Lorenzo was an excellent host with great communication and went out of his way to make us feel comfortable - including calling a taxi for us on our way out of town. We had one room within a two-room flat with common sitting area and kitchen. It is nicely done with everything you would need for your stay. (Toothbrush, power charging station, and so many more fine touches). How nice that everything is complementary, including the juice and water in the fridge as well as small snacks and wine. This property is centrally located so you can walk one way to main tourist sites such as the Duomo and Opera House and another direction to the new part of the city with shopping centers and modern buildings. Excellent Wifi. Smart TV including access to Amazon Prime video and Netflix.
hotelName:
4    Moscova Luxury B&B
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The rooms are all perfect! The place is adoráble. Best place to stay in Milan. Brera neighborhood. Near two metro stations! Supermarket just in front! Very good restaurants nearby. Best location! Lorenzo is the best hostess and helped us with everything we needed. No need to look for another place to stay in Milan
hotelName:
4    Moscova Luxury B&B
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed for two wonderful days in this amazing B&B. Lorenzo was very easy to contact and nothing was to much trouble. The pictures don't do it justice everything is designer furniture and there are so many extras added in. The area is an extremely nice area of Milan and because it is in a secure complex felt very safe. Would thoroughly recommend Lorenzo's luxury B&B to anyone!!
hotelName:
4    Moscova Luxury B&B
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: What a beautiful place to stay! My friend and I had plenty of space and found everything we could have needed for our weekend stay at Suitime. The apartment was immaculate, quiet and well located-close to the Last Supper, the metro and the canals. The staff were incredibly helpful and friendly, with recommendations for our stay throughout. The apartment and area felt very safe and secure. We will definitely return!
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It is like a five star hotel!!!!Super in everything !The room was very clean ,organized ,spacious and big.I stayed with my two kids ages 9 and 3 years old !We were very comfortable !Flavio the director is so supportive !I will stay again for sure !!!!!
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We recently stayed at one of the suitime appartments in Milan. The appartment was very comfortable and had everything we needed. However, what truly made the stay there amazing was the hospitality of the host Flavio. He is an incredibly kind person, and gave us all the insight on where to go in Milan and anything we wanted to know. It is rare to find such a genuine person, and we were very blessed to meet him.Grazie Flavio! We will gladly visit again! Annerixt and Marion
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We enjoyed everything about this hotel, the room, the layout, the attentive service, the peaceful ambience, the central location, the cleanliness...Stronly recommended for families or couples. Peope in charge go out of their way to accommodate guests!
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very cozy and a modern apartment. Very clean, great location - 15 walk from all the major tourist attractions. Big flat screen TV (in case you are a TV junky :) ), fridge, good tableware.The only minor issue was the internet - not bad, but could be better
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here with my wife and teenage son and we absolutely loved our stay. Favio and Christian were super responsive and helpful and the room was maintained very well and cleaned thoroughly. Nearest train station is like just a 5 mins walk away and it is walkable to Duomo in about 20 mins.Would highly recommend this place to people who want to stay away from crowds and constant buzz of the city centre.
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This split level apartment was great for 3 adults. The responsiveness and helpfulness is the hosts are amazing. As we were arriving after the recommended check in time, the hosts made it easier for us to get he apartment keys and were very quick on email to make sure we were all settled in. Only tip is if you are staying in the room at the top you may have to leave your luggage at the bottom as is it a narrow stair case to get to the other bed/kitchen area. It is a 15min walk to the last supper which was great and the area is lovely and quiet. We really enjoyed our stay.
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very good location, excellent kitchen, but above all the most amazing staff!!!!Whatever you think is wrong with the appartment is annuled by their kindness and readiness to help.So rare to meet such nice people.
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I first have to mention that the description of “available beds” is inaccurate. The “sofa beds” are actually real mattresses on a wooden support, the size of a twin bed, which are by all means much better! We were a party of four and absolutely needed additional two separate beds. Everyone definitely had a good night sleep. I usually discard rooms with sofa beds. However from the beginning via email, Flavio was very helpful and immediately reassured me they would put in an extra bed if necessary. The appartment was very clean. Beds were very comfy. I appreciated the spotless white bed linen. Flavio and Annie were very helpful and extremely nice and welcoming people. The appartment and staff deserve a 5. However, the only reason I rated it 4 was due to the location. Not as central as I had expected it. The building is beautiful and well-kept, you have a parking nearby but public transport it’s a bit far for people who have physical disabilities like me. The 7 mins walk to the tram it would take anybody, was a 20min walk for me. Took taxis thereafter to Piazza del Duomo which is 2.1km away. I definitely recommend this place.
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The trip started with meeting Flavio; what a wonderful person. He tries very hard to make stay the best. We were ther over a week and could not say enough on the place. It was 30 min walk to anywhere, and we did day trips everyday. The train station was close by subway. Travelled to Torino, bergamo, como/bellagio, Verona. Milan also was amazing. The place. Would not be for people who could not climb stairs as the kitchen was on second floor of the suite. It had all the amenities needed.
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The apartment was well located, clean and had all expected amenities. It was well laid out and comfortable.Flavio greets you personally and gives you excellent tips on what to do and where to eat in Milano. I have never had such kind and expert advise. Flavio was easy to contact and always ready to help make our stay as enjoyable and trouble free as possible.I highly recommend Suitime to anyone travelling to Milano. I hope Flavio expands his business to other countries.
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is a series of two floor suites complete with kitchens in an interesting part of Milan. There is no front desk or concierge but the proprietor is always available. It is close to some good restaurants and mini markets. You can walk to the Last Supper or take a cab to the Duomo. It is near some excellent shopping off the beaten tourist path. The building itself is quite historical and there is a beautiful garden.
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We visited Milan in July 2016 and we stayed for 3 nights at this beautiful apartment block. I have to say I was reluctant at the beginning however once we got in and we met the brothers who are in charge of this place we got exited.The place might not be right in the heart of Milan centre but everything is at proximity.The stay was quite enjoyable, the apartment had everything you could possibly want, even drinks.Thank you guys for making our stay in Milan so memorable.We will definitely be back
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: was grets the room and the galria was perfect like brand new, espreso too:-) the hotel is 2-3 km from the city. you have parking 5-10 eur - +nir the hotel .thanks to i hope to come milano again. thank for allshlomi
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great accommodation. Apartment was very clean, modern with good use of space. Loved the simplistic décor. Bed linen was spotless and beds very comfy. Good location with a short walk to the centre. Met Flavio, the owner of Suitime, who was very welcoming and friendly. Would definitely recommend!
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Suitime was a very comfortable and convenient place to stay in Milan, and the owners, Flavio and Rudina, are wonderful hosts! They gave us all the info we needed ahead of time to access the building where the suites are located, and they were very friendly and helpful when they met us at check-in. The suites were very clean and bright and equipped with helpful amenities, such as bath products, coffee & tea, and a mini fridge. The beds were comfortable, and the bathrooms were spacious. Potential visitors should be aware that each suite has two levels with a staircase in between them. Also the room on the 2nd level is like a loft area with an inset railing that overlooks the first floor, so the two levels are not completely separate and private from each other. For our group of family and friends, it was a fine arrangement to share space but also have some separation of living space.The historic building that the suites are located in is beautiful, including the inner courtyard that leads to the hallway where the rooms are. The neighborhood is clean and safe... there is absolutely no disturbance from the prison facility across the street. We found a great cafe nearby called Colonial Cafe to have coffee & breakfast at each morning, so it's no problem that breakfast is not provided at the suites. Suitime is located only about 600 m, or a 7-8 minute walk, from the Conciliazione Metro stop, so getting to and from sites around Milan is no problem.We took a 2-day trip to Lake Como, and Flavio & Rudina were very accommodating to let us leave our large luggage with them until we came back. Upon our return, we rented a car, and Flavio was very helpful to let us know about needing to pay for a city tax required for driving in the city center of Milan and how to buy the ticket for it, which the car rental office had not told us anything about.
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Perfect location , in an historic building with anAmazing entrance The room is a beautiful duplex in one of the best area of Milan quiet and very safe .All the amenities including a Nespreso machine Tea and even biscuit ...Everything is here to please you You can cook as there is a fully equipped kitchen.The room are very clean , beautiful modern decorationBig flat screen TV , a very confortable bed andBed sheets.The owner is very helpful and very nice toRecommend me nice restaurant and shopping Area I am so happy to find this gem in the heart ofMilan and highly recommend this fantastic place .
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Lovely welcome to the apartment , very clean as cleaner came everyday with fresh linen and towels and even water in the fridge .Run very well by owners Rudina and flavio , who gave us good reconditions to go for breakfast or how to use the tram. Aircon is room , with great wardrobe storage amd black out curtains .Will defo be returning soon .
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I now know why this place gets such good reviews! Set in a gorgeous building with a fascinating history, suitime was a lovely place to stay. I had suite 2, which had the bed and bath downstairs, and a kitchen and lounge upstairs. The rooms were petite but perfect and the facilities and amenities were excellent. Flavio came and introduced himself and was so helpful. He gave me directions to anywhere I might need to go and answered all my questions. There were also chocolates by the bed from a local pasticceria that were delicious. The style was modern, and I especially liked the marble finishes. The towels were large and fluffy and the bed was super comfortable. Leaving felt like leaving family! I'd definitely stay again.
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Suite is located in a beautiful 1886 building.The front is amazing and a big antique door gives entrance to a foyer lined by six terracota statues.To the right another door lives entrance to the six cozy, beautiful apartments.They are impeccable! In the first floor are the bedroom with very fine linens and the bathroom with all amenities. On the second floor is the social level, with a table, chairs, a sofa, large TV and well equipped kitchen, large refrigerator with daily bottles of water. There is an espresso machine with daily capsules available. Flavio and his brother are amazing! Even though there is no front desk they are on the premises every day from around 9am till 3pm and whenever you need them! They arrange for taxis, give you all necessary info reg restaurants, transportation, etc. The place is about 1.3 kms from the Duomo but the tram is about 2-3 blocks away(get the 4,50 euro daily pass, good for the tram, metro and buses!) All in all an amazing little gem and the service Flavio and Christian provide makes you feel at home!
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: What we think is really wonderful at Suitime was the very warm welcome by Rudina and Christian. They were there when we arrived on our first day, and every morning when we left the building there was some one, either Rudina, Flavio or Christian, to ask if everything was ok, to give us tips about what to do en what to see, en were really interested as we've never experienced in hotels before.The building and apartments are lovely. Nice modern design, everything is really clean, furnished kitchen is also comfortable. Neighboorhood is quiet and beautiful, on short walking distance to underground. Had some wonderful days in Milan, Suite was definitely part of these memorable days.
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed for 3 nights at Suitime and found the apartment duplex small but with a modern well fitted kitchen and living room (upstairs), shower room and bedroom (downstairs), everything functioned well, comfortable double bed, large flat screen tv. The apartments are situated inside a lovely older property with a door entry system, in a quiet neighbourhood and with a 10 minute walk to the nearest underground (Ambroglio) from which you can get the metro Garibaldi or central station (and onto Malpensa airport). Suitime is also handy for walking to Duomo and Castle. The only negative for me was the open plan up and down,which meant one can hear the tv upstairs from the bedroom below (only a negative for couples with 1 person liking to stay up late!). We would definitely go back and maybe take headphones next time. Rudina and Flavio were also very welcoming and helpful, many thanks all!
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We spent three nights at Suitime and were blown away by the personalised service and attention to detail that Flávio and Christian show their guests. Each of us was greeted at the door on arrival and they made us feel as though no request was too much trouble. Their advice on where to go and what to do was excellent too. I would absolutely recommend Suitime to anyone visiting Milan. The room had everything we needed and was spotless.
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: What a great place to stay! Suitime has comfortable 'double decker' appartments, brand new and well appointed on the inside, monumental on the outside. In a pleasant neighbourhood, from which you can easily get to the city centre. Nice extras such as a portable pocket wifi router and public transport tickets. And above all: VERY friendly hosts Christian, Flavio and Rudina, who make you feel welcome and are fun talking to.
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellent hospitality and service from Flavio and his team. Comfortable and classy within walking distance of all Milan's major attractions. The large shower is a real plus, especially for bigger persons like me. Highly recommended.
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice, safe, upscale location in a residential area of Milan and only a few Metro stops from the Duomo. Excellent hosts gave us great recommendations for dining, shopping, sightseeing, etc. Clean, cute apartments w/everything you need and the price is right. We'll definitely stay again when we're in Milano!
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Recently a small group of friends traveling from Washington DC opted, at the behest of an Italian friend, to take three of the six units stay in this Milanese standout. True, this is not a coventional, full-service hotel. It offers immaculate accommodation in effectively small, but astonishingly well-designed and comfy apartments. To a person, our group was COMPLETELY charmed and overwhelmed by the thoughtful graciousness of our dynamic and delightful hosts, Rudina and Flávio. While it's true the fact that they do not reside on-premise, they were often on-hand and completely engaged in ensuring that our stay was in every respect without spot, flaw or wrinkle. The neighborhood is agreeably quiet and decidedly elegant, as well as interesting. Tourist sights are nearby, as well as a good food market, delightful neighborhood restaurant, caffe and gelato options. We ADORED everything about Suitime. Kudos to Flávio and Rudina who made our trip to Milan so special and whom we hope to have the pleasure of seeing in Washington.
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a wonderful 2 night stay at Suitime and we highly recommend it!The room was comfortable, clean and in a beautiful building. Bathroom was a bit small (narrow, to be precise), but had everything you need (compliments to the designer for a very smart use of space). Location was good, quiet, yet central enough). The neighborhood is very nice (shops, cafés...). As other guests wrote, Flavio can easily win at least a title of one of the nicest men you will meet in your life. We arrived late at night from the airport and received information on transportation from Rudia by mail. Flavio was very kind to welcome us warmly in the middle of the night and explain about the facilities and answer our questions. He also gave us very good tips before we left to North Italy.
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at Suitime for 2 nights in July and were surprised by the quality of the room and service. The hosts Rudina and Flavio (and Christian) are 24/7 reachable and answer immediately - we for example needed to know where to park - got our email answered within 10 minutes (btw. they have a deal with a parking near by - great!). The room is separated in two floors - on the first you have the bedroom and bathroom and on the second floor something like a living room and kitchen. Everything was very clean and modern. The flexibility to be able to cook is priceless when you arrive at 12 in the night and all restaurants are closed :)Regarding location - you can easily walk to Duomo within 20 minutes...and on the way you already see some nice parts of the city.To sum up - this is probably one of the best places in Milan that you can get for this money range! And having such great hosts is priceless!
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed at this gem in January and was welcomed beyond my expectations by Flavio, who was a very accommodating host. The room had a very cool set up consisting of two floors, living area, kitchen, bedroom, power windows and much more! Definitely more space then your standard hotel room and a much more luxurious experience. I wouldn't stay in another place in Milan but this one! Its unfortunate that there's only one Suitime. Hopefully that changes in the future!
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I agree with all the various reviewers. The place, which is technically a bed and breakfast, is definitely unusual for Milanese standards, inside a beautiful old building; I understand suites vary in size, mine was quite small (hence the bed no suitable for two tall adults); but having the second floor, with the kitchen and the single bed, is excellent for small families. Modern decor, I personally find the apartments too hot and a bit claustrophobic, being below the street level, but probably that's just me. For less than 140 euros/night, it's a good choice.
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Rooms : very nice, very comfortable. Manager Flavio : Friendly & very good satisfaction...Excellent quality of sleep: the area is quiet and the apartament well sealed to the outside. Coffee machine was very good.
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The only hotel/apartment I have stayed in all my tours where the owners overshadow the hotel ! Flávio and Rudina are such excellent and caring hosts that words fail me. And this despite the fact that I did not have the pleasure of meeting them during my two day stay.My stay in Milan was a tough one with my baggage not arriving for two days straight making our Italy trip a real non starter. But Flávio was continuously in touch making us feel at home through his calls, his humorous nature and caring ways. They make you feel that they represent the hospitality of their country. And deal with you straight from the heart and not in a strictly commercial way. I did not find this hospitality even in Rome and I am glad that they were the first Italians I ment in Italy !I would not say the Milano Suitime is a luxury experience but it is a very very comfortable place to stay. Perfectly located to start tours. And very comfortable. I loved the fact that it is housed with other buildings and you have to get in with an access code to the building ! Made us feel very local and very Italian :-)We had two good nights of sleep here and had no problem getting anywhere from here. It is close to bus/metro stations and yet far enough to be peaceful. Which makes for a good nights sleep as well. Ideally suited for people looking for value for money but with a touch of style and local flavour.Just to share, the hotel helped me even after departure as I required some mails for claiming delayed baggage insurance. This is a big deal as most hotels simply forget after you checkout. Checkin to Suitime for a relationship with Italy. And my best regards once again to Flávio and Rudina.
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed for several nights. The service was excellent and the accommodations were clean and very stylish. There was significant street noise though and the hallways are loud despite very real attempts of the owners to keep the noise down.The hotel is close to public transportations and several excellent restaurants. I would highly recommend this hotel for those seeking an apartment experience.
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Sadly i only stayed 2 nights at Suitime.I was in for a surprise when i arrived late at around 930pm. Although there was no 24 hour reception there was always someone online or by sms who is available. The apartment is in a very quiet residential neighborhood and arriving late at night opening the gate into a courtyard dark at first gave me a bit of a chill but was totally beautiful when lit and i had figured my way around to my apartment.The place has 2 floors with a living room on the 2nd floor and the bedroom on the first. I had the best night's rest with their very comfortable bed.I chanced upon a cafe a few meters down Via Vico . still open which was next to a gym and was welcomed by the chef himself. The location is perfect especially if you are in town for the fair as the nearest metro station Conciliazione is just a few minutes walk and runs directly to the Rho for the fair and to the city center (ex. DUOMO). The Cadorna station which has the Malpensa Express is 5 minutes by taxi.On my last day, i met the owner Flavio and his colleague Christian who were very warm and helpful contrary to most of those you meet at the airport or some establishments ....hardly speaks any english and seem they can't be bothered if you dont speak the language.Oh and Rudina, too!! Who i only had online contact was very prompt in attending to my needs.Will definitely stay the next time here!
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: As a professional musician I have experience to stay in a wide range of various hotels all around the world, from very simple 2-stars apartments to the plush 6-stars ones. The Suitime Hotel in Milano will count to the best places I ever visited. It's being located in a kind of old Italian palazzo but inside you will find modern high-tech designed two-leveled snall but very cosy and comfortable suite.I will not list here everything what they offer for this very very reasonable price (it's impressive anyway), but the most important are the people running this hotel. Two Italian brothers - very nice, honest and friendly young people who help you not only with your luggage but with every smallest detail, explain you everything you need and, the most important, let you feel like you are the one and only very best guest of their hotel!I think we all should support this young business project if we want to make our world a bit better.Best recommendation!Prof. Peter Ovtcharov,Seoul/South Korea
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I slept at SUITIME for 4 nights with my colleagues and boss when we came to Milan to attend a conference. The rooms are spacious, elegant, there's everything you need and more. The kitchen is very modern, and includes an espresso machine, pans, cutlery etc. There's a lot of privacy if you are sharing the room with another person, as beds are located on different floors of the same room. The location is also very good, linked to buses, trams, metro and a train station (Milano Cadorna). The quality price ratio is great considering that a room can host up to three people and has bedroom+bathroom+kitchen/livingroom, 2 tvs, air conditioning etc...it's like being in your own apartment. Flavio and Rudina are extremely kind, friendly and always available for every type of need you may have - my colleagues and boss literally fell in love with them and we ended up buying a bottle of wine to thank them for being so nice to us! Highly recommended for everyone who wants to have a nice stay in Milan, you won't be disappointed.
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I have spent 11 nights staying at this fabulous suite with excellent service of Flavio and Rudina. I feel blessed that I have opportunity to stay here for such a long time. First of all, I booked the suite via expedia.sg. The price is reasonable for the stay and so much worth for it. The room is so spacious, clean and with good design of the furnitures. Everyday there will be a cleaner to tidy the room, replenish the toiletries and drinking water in the fridge. The best thing ever is the room even equipped with espresso coffee machine. So the coffee capsules ( both caffein and as well as decafeined) will be replenished daily together with the biscuits and cookies as well. What a lovely service for the guest who stays in the suite. In addition, the location of the suite is strategic and only less than 10mins walk to the metro station. There is an attraction nearby to see " The Last Supper" by Leonardo da Vinci with just 10mins walking distance. There are some nice restaurants nearby as well as Mcdonald. I feel safe staying the area as I was travelling alone. Even this suite does not have 24 hours reception, Flavio and Rudina provide 24/7 services and they were so helpful to answer any of my questions at any times. They make me feel like home. I really appreciate what they did to let me had a pleasant stay in Milan. On my last day of stay, I even received a sweet and lovely surprise gift by Flavio and Rudina with a sweet note attached. They are really the kindest couple that I have ever meet in Milan. Whoever want to find a special lodging other than the normal routine hotel, please choose to stay here and you will be no regret.
hotelName:
5    Suitime Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed in this hotel during a business trip. Rooms are comfortable and clean, breakfast is ok. The reception needs some improvement - they are extremely slow and checkin takes ages. They are not very welcoming and prefer to speak with each other rather than give you some attention. This is true for most of the people in the reception but not all of them.Finally, the location is too far from the city center.
hotelName:
6    Radisson Blu Hotel, Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The rooms are very clean and pleasant, the staff are helpful but breakfast is poor and not worth the money ( even the coffee is not up to Italian standard ).The main downside is the location - this particular suburb has nothing appealing and the hotel sticks out among the grubby kebab shops and convenience stores.Getting into Milan centre can be done by taxi, train/metro ( the walk to the nearest train station takes you along a very isolated route you might feel unsafe at night ), or local bus.
hotelName:
6    Radisson Blu Hotel, Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Old school hotel Rooms are perfect. I have been upgraded to a suite. Thx for that. But.....The rest is poor. Waiting at breakfast time. Waiting for check out. How could that be today. ? I will arrive late at my meeting Too bad for me
hotelName:
6    Radisson Blu Hotel, Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Typical Radisson- clean, functional, friendly staff, great breakfast. Secure parking facilities nice pool. There is no doubt this is a good hire, the only real downside is how far out of the center of Milan it is.
hotelName:
6    Radisson Blu Hotel, Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Radisson's staff is impeccable and their hospitality is much appreciated, especially Amreen. She has been polite and very kind to me. Thank you for employing such hard-working people, Radisson. More power to you, Amreen.
hotelName:
6    Radisson Blu Hotel, Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Room was in very good condition , considerable room size, and nice terrace overlooking Milan. Bathroom was in excellent condition and lighting. It could be quite a distance from the city center, but worth the stay.. staff were very friendly and helpful..........
hotelName:
6    Radisson Blu Hotel, Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I have been there for a business trip . I like the hotel , staff and breakfast . Everything was perfect. Room was clean and enough big. We find easily taxi to go to city centre and just paid 23 eur. The staf was helpful . Breakfast was.amazing. Next time , I will be with my family for a vacation and I really recommend this hotel.
hotelName:
6    Radisson Blu Hotel, Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The stay in the Radisson blu Hotel Milan was great.The rooms are renovated, clean and welcoming. We enjoyed a great dinner in the Leonardo restaurant.Stuff members are really helpfull and friendly.We can highly recommend it.Its well located.With the subway its only a view stations to the vity center.
hotelName:
6    Radisson Blu Hotel, Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: First of all, i would like to point out that the reception staff is really friendly.and well run.Also the cleanliness of the rooms was great and the bed really comfortable.Byt having stayed at a number of Radisson hotels and knowing that the BLU line, has to be one notch above the rest, i have to say the hotel kitchen leaves a bit to be desired. The first day at the breakfast, which closes at 10.30, you get the feeling at 10.15, that you are no longer wanted, as they start clearing the tables.It is also worth noting, that the juices are not fresh, which i have at least come to expect from a BLU line hotel.Later the same evening we ordered dinner at the bar, where the fries were soft and the club sandwich cold. The morning of our departure, we finally also noticed that after having ordered pancakes and a omelet from the kitchen, that these were not fresh either. We found out quite simply, because it was ready and served withing 30 seconds of ordering.
hotelName:
6    Radisson Blu Hotel, Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great Business hotel with good parking and very friendly and helpful staff. Most of the rooms have just been very nicely redone. Fast internet, spacious bathrooms. Good connection to highway and airport (train station also close by).
hotelName:
6    Radisson Blu Hotel, Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: GREAT service at the hotel , Feel like home . Front staff was very nice and helpful . Highly qualified and experienced staff at the hotel . Room is very nice with all the facilities available I would like to give 100% satisfaction on room service . Breakfast was the best in hotel so as Bar . Overall great experience wanted to come back again .Thanks
hotelName:
6    Radisson Blu Hotel, Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Beautiful Boutique hotel. This is one of the few facilities in Milan that extends a block and is not covered in graffiti job well done. The staff were friendly and courteous. I did have problem at check out the spoiled my 6 day stay at this hotel. I was quoted in writing that my single room for 2 would be 179.50 euro and was charged 215 euros and was told I had a double room which I was unaware of. The staff would not honour the contract. Which cost $53 Canadian dollar/day EXTRA.
hotelName:
6    Radisson Blu Hotel, Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It is a good hotel with very curtitious staff.Good breakfast , comfortable room.Enjoyed the stay for four nights and five days. I sujjest that,the hotel should also have a travel desk to guide.Otherwise, it is a very good hotel to stay in Milan.Cuisine , excellent Deepak Bhattacharjee
hotelName:
6    Radisson Blu Hotel, Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This isn't the best Radisson Blu I've stayed in, it feels rather faded and unloved. Worn buttons on lifts, cracks in the washbasin, TV remote held together by sticky tape (which didn't work because it fell apart in my hand). Skirting boards were scuffed and the room had a slightly odd musty smell when I arrived. The TV in my room had really poor image quality so I'm guessing the internal cable system is as dated as the rest of the infrastructure. The AC struggled, and never managed to get the room as cool as I wanted. The room has a kettle to make tea or (instant) coffee.There's a good sized desk if you want to work, and the WiFi is adequate, however the desk only had one power socket which really isn't enough for the collection of electronics I carry around on business trips. There doesn't appear to be any option for room service (or if there was I never found a room service menu). There's a reasonable restaurant which isn't exactly haute cuisine but provided me with a good scallop starter and a veal main course.The best feature of this Radisson was the staff in both reception and the restaurant, who were very friendly.The hotel's a fairly long way from the centre of Milan, so might not be ideal if you're a tourist, and if you're here on business you may need to allow plenty of time for a taxi to take you somewhere in the morning traffic. Bottom line: probably won't stay here again until / unless they do a major refurb.
hotelName:
6    Radisson Blu Hotel, Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I liked the hotel in general but it’s located a bit far from the city center. The area itself is fine. The water in the pool was cold. There were no bathrobes in the room but it might depend on the room I booked.
hotelName:
6    Radisson Blu Hotel, Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed in Radisson Blue hotel while visiting Milan. Hotel was selected by my travel agent. Very nice chain hotel with all facilities available. Rooms are capacious and neat clean with extra large washroom. Staff is nice and helpful. Breakfast is also good with range of menu. Only bad thing is it's location which is away from Central Square and also very far from Airport. But tram Station is on walking distance. Hotel has no facility of providing public transport tickets or passes.
hotelName:
6    Radisson Blu Hotel, Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I highly recommend this hotel! Staff is so nice and kind! Always listen to their customers. Only handicap is not being in the city center but don’t worry, there is a tram stop just one minute walk away from the hotel!
hotelName:
6    Radisson Blu Hotel, Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The property is on the outskirts of main city or central city. It's quite after 8-9 pm. The neighboring area is residential.If you want to enjoy Milan and city life then I would not recommend this hotel because it is far from center and cabs are expensive.This hotel should be used if you are in Milan for trade shows or fashion week etc or during peek season because it's best to airport.
hotelName:
6    Radisson Blu Hotel, Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: stayed 2 nights but have not slept coz of aircon and after informing staff... nothing happened.. restaurant staff is stiff and food quality is poor.. improve focus on senior citizen atleast.. we wasted our money by choosing Radission
hotelName:
6    Radisson Blu Hotel, Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is a fair distance from the city centre. The gym and spa is decent. The rooms, as expected, are clean, comfortable and nice. The train / tram is outside the hotel which is convenient. A nice patio area to eat and drink.
hotelName:
6    Radisson Blu Hotel, Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good quality hotel, friendly staff & very helpful, can’t fault the staff. Out of way from central Milan but easy transport links. No problem. Downside was Pool was cold & changing facilities poor. Carpet in room had stains of damp by the door. Overall experience was good though
hotelName:
6    Radisson Blu Hotel, Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed in this Hotel for one night, influenced by a promotion in booking.com and the brand Radisson. I paid 185€, no breakfast included, for something that is barely worth half of it. Dodgy, no charm, badly maintained, nothing to see or do in the neighbourhood. Swwimig pool is a narrow path of water, bathroom door with old paint splits, parts of the carpet unglued and stained. Room size ok and bed comfortable. Just one of those old Conference Hotels completely depersonalised a dodgy.
hotelName:
6    Radisson Blu Hotel, Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We enjoyed every moment from the very beautiful design, throughout the fine dining and hotel service up to the evening spa and comfortable bed. It is perfect place for your stay visiting Milan expo, just getting relaxed, going for shopping or up town. Thanks to whole the team for making it happen.
hotelName:
6    Radisson Blu Hotel, Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I've spent 2 weeks there and I had a very pleasant stay. The breakfast is good and with produces of quality. I did not dine there; who wants to pay 15€ for pizza or a dish he can get for half the price nearby ?The only bad point is the TV signal makes you feel like you are back in the 80's and analog TV. Everywhere it's like this (Gym, room, bar). It's just unacceptable. I could also point out that things are damaged left and right in the room or elsewhere... the SPA wasn't working during my stay.Close to the tram (line 12) and the train to MXP or MILAN.
hotelName:
6    Radisson Blu Hotel, Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I will not stay again in this hotel. It used to be a very nice hotel with a great spa and relaxing area with sauna and hammam on both men and women side, they have gone cheap, and after informing they were "renovating" after a year it is still not the case; They just lied about it and do not offer that service anymore. The swimming pool is not heated anymore and very cold making it impossible to use; The hotel does not as clean as it use to; Personally I will not go there anymore, and do not recommend it to anyone of my followers. Keep posted I will soon listed my new favorite place for Milano but stay away from Radisson Blu
hotelName:
6    Radisson Blu Hotel, Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It was such a pleasure to have Christian check us in. We were left stranded when another hotel didn’t want to accomate our reservation. I finally got a hold of this hotel, stating that there was just one Queen room left. We took it because there was no other place to go and my mom had become ill the day before. He noticed how tired we were and was kind enough to give us an extra hour to check out so my mom can sleep.We were trying to figure out how we would sleep with not enough beds, but then we hear a knock at our door- Christian had called the staff to supply us with an extra bed. This was all at the wee hours of 2am!Thank you SO much for your hospitality Christian, you are the standard that many hotels should follow.
hotelName:
6    Radisson Blu Hotel, Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: After accidentally booking the wrong date (mixed up February and March, oops!) on an nonrefundable, non changeable room, the hotel staff was very helpful in looking for a solution. This finally resulted in a refund. Many thanks; will stay again on my next business trip to Milan!
hotelName:
6    Radisson Blu Hotel, Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The Radisson is a very nice 4 star hotel, great staff, easy parking and surprisingly convenient access to the city. We stayed for one night and checked in early. The staff provided excellent service and quickly found a room for us. In our standard room we had the usual mini bar and a coffee maker. Free water, fruit and candy is available in the lobby. WiFi was a bit slow but works great for browsing the internet. The tram (line 12) stops very close to the hotel and takes you straight into town and the cathedral. The hotel can sell you tickets to public transportation or you download the app and buy online. The area around the hotel is quiet and street parking is free.
hotelName:
6    Radisson Blu Hotel, Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very nice staff, very good services, including gym, spa and room service. All a good quality and good fluxibility, the spa and gym close at 11pm and the morning breakfast also end at 11a.Wa a good experience
hotelName:
6    Radisson Blu Hotel, Milan
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object
