I won't recommend this hostel for families or people who appreciate a little more peace and quiet. I found the room to be very cramped. I mean, you have 6 people staying in a room, in which half the space is taken up by the triple decker beds. Another one-third is taken up by the gigantic metallic lockers. There’s no table in the room – because obviously there’s no space for one, not even a tiny one. And only one chair. Like, I don’t understand the hostel design. Surely, you can have more space-efficient solutions for the luggage, and actually free up space for more furnishings.
hotelName:
8    Ostello Bello Grande
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I had such a great time in this hostel. Awesome for solo travelers. Staff super friendly! I was sad for leaving because it was such a great atmosphere. The free breakfast and dinner was def a plus. One of the best!! Great to make friends. Thank you Ostello Bello!!
hotelName:
8    Ostello Bello Grande
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: As a very picky traveller, who is used to hoTels, I had many concerns about hostels. This place amazed me from the first step in.Very friendly crew, which makes you feel welcomed and home immediately,Very clean, there is always a cleaning group available,Very cosy furnished, pillows were most comfy ones I got, even compared to 5 star hotels! Bunks are very stable.WiFi works amazingly everywhere, even at 6th floor!Witty wall stickers and quotes can crack you up unexpectedly and you will be even warned for rules with humor. Very peace-/respectful, I think I haven’t seen any person with a sulky face, even from crew itself,People would say it’s a noisy hostel but hey, they give you FREE earplugs among many other things as portable charger, network, laptops, umbrella, guitar, anything. Just ask for it! Keep it in mind you are 2 minutes away from the heart of the city and not on swiss mountains. The main benefit is, you can easily make friends here. The hostel arranges FREE walking tours and there is always an activity each day, which allows you to interact with people. If it’s too much for you, try the Chill Room, Garden or Rooftop. They are very comfortable and you ll feel recharged. This place recycles organic waste, how bad can they be? They totally deserve the throphies they snatched, Hostello Bello Grande will always have a speacial place in my heart.
hotelName:
8    Ostello Bello Grande
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I needed to stay the night in Milan and catch and early flight at malpensa. This place was perfect because it’s 2 blocks from Milano centrale so you can easily catch the malpensa express. I was impressed by their customer service. The staff was very welcoming and approachable. They give you a free drink, snacks, and breakfast. They had an aperitivo, but I was not there for it. The cornetti during snack service are so so good! I was disappointed that they were not included at the breakfast. The breakfast was a nice amenity, but nothing special. Eggs, hot dogs, bread, yogurt, cereal. Overall I would highly recommend for budget travelers! It makes the city very accessible for people at any means. The hostel is very social. I was there on a Sunday night and when I walked into the lobby if felt like a crowded bar. And obviously if you are sharing a room you can be lucky to have quiet roommates or have disruptive ones, but that’s just the nature of staying in a hostel.
hotelName:
8    Ostello Bello Grande
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very nice atmosphere and helpful staff. A bit noisy though because of partying teenagers running in the corridors, slamming doors and shouting. We were on the second floor which contained also doorms with several beds. Maybe it would be more calm to have a room on a floor higher up in the building.
hotelName:
8    Ostello Bello Grande
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: At first we chose this hostel because of location, just few mins walk from the central train station!!! However, this little gem had enlighten our day and we actually did a “tour”! Haha just feels so cool compared to the hostels that we have stayed before! Probably my 2nd favorite hostel in Europe (my top favorite is a hostel in St.Moriz, Switzerland!!).....Nice kitchen, nice outdoor patio, nice room, and very good hospitality! Highly recommended!
hotelName:
8    Ostello Bello Grande
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I have just left after spending 2 nights here. The hostel is literally a 2 minute walk away with the main station and the underground. On arrival the staff were really lovely and gave me some tips on what to see and not do in the city. There’s a free walking tour everyday at 3pm but unfortunately I didn’t go on it because I went to Lake Como instead. You get a free drink voucher to use at the bar and a free map of the city. I’d opted for a single private room and was very happy with it. The bathroom was small but adequate and you got some free toiletries. The bed was comfortable but it has a metal frame so be careful because I banged my head on it in the night. There was also coat hangers, a dressing room table and a bed side light. I went to bed really early one the first night and was worried I’d be kept up with the noise all night. This wasn’t the case and didn’t hear anything about around 10.30. This was on the third floor. The breakfast was good for a free hostel breakfast and was plenty of bread, James, sausages, scrambled eggs, cereal, juices and coffee each morning. I can’t comment on the evening meal because I opted it go to a restaurant instead with me only being there 2 nights. The food looked basic but plenty of pasta, beans and pulses and pizza squares. I had a look around and the terrace on the top floor was very big. I wanted to spend more time in the bar but I was that tired from by exploring in the day I only had 1 or 2 drinks each night. If I was to go back to Milan I would definitely stay here.
hotelName:
8    Ostello Bello Grande
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I loved my weekend in this Hostel, the people at the reception are really nice and the ambiance of the place makes you feel comfortable even if you are traveling alone. When i arrived i received a free drink and the breakfast was free and healthy. The location is amazing since its only 2 min walking from the central station and its only 15 min walking to the Duomo church. So thank again for a great experience, it was my first time in a hostel and thanks to you i will happily do it again.
hotelName:
8    Ostello Bello Grande
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I had a really good stay. The staff is really nice, the facilities as well - good served for breakfast and dinner, spaces to rest or relax and the rooms. I met a lot of people and if I had to go back to Milan I certainly will go there again!
hotelName:
8    Ostello Bello Grande
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My review is totally based off on a personal experience (taking into account all the other worldwide hostels where I have been to), so it could not be shared by someone else, fair enough - however I do not understand the excellent reviews given by the other guests. Have you ever been to an EXCELLENT hostel before? What is your criteria when giving 5*? I think these are given out too much easily and I will explain you why:First off : check-in: slow. Upon my arrival I had to wait 15 mint to be checked in as both receptionists were busy but so slow. Friendliness is ok but sometimes you gotta speed it up, especially when you see there are people (tired) in the queue.On the good side, the guys were pretty kind and keen on helping out with any request.Room: I’d booked a 5-bedded room, made up of 2 bunk beds so one would be with 3 beds on top of each other, I was on the top one. The room itself is pretty small and there is no curtains for privacy ( 5 star hostels should definitely have them).There’s a little light, socket and a small basket next to each bed.Lockers and padlock are provided. I don’t know about the other rooms but mine had a private bathroom, although this is a great feature, I strongly believe sharer bathroom/showers should be available outside the room since one bathroom for 5 pax is not enough, especially in the morning when we have to take turns, but that’s not the case, there is no shared facilities.The worst part was the noise. The room was on the first floor right next to the street... I couldn’t sleep a wink. Make sure to ask for a room located on the other side of the building.Breakfast: 5 items and that’s it. Some eggs,wustel,bread,cornflakes,milk that’s it.I’ve been to hostels providing a breakfast that could be compare to some luxury hotels. You’re supposed to offer a wider selection of food, given that you are ranked as the top hostel in town.Another thing I notice is that this place is packed out with Italians, on a typical Fri/Sat night. That’s because drinks are cheap and so they’d only come here for drinking and loudly shouting (that’s why you can’t sleep).I am sorry but it was all very disappointing and people need to know the truth.
hotelName:
8    Ostello Bello Grande
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Perfect location, the warmest friendliest staff possible, great activities and things going off daytime or nighttime. Clean comfortable rooms and the best atmosphere for a solo traveller. Met lots of lovely people and had the most fantastic stay. Loved it.
hotelName:
8    Ostello Bello Grande
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Just a few steps from Milano Central Station, the best hostel in Milan..Italy..around Europe and more! The super friendly staff makes you feel like home away from home. Moreover it is a great place to have a drink with friends or to make new friends, with a lovely dehor for the summer time and an amazing terrace overlooking Milan downtown for its guests!!
hotelName:
8    Ostello Bello Grande
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Always wanted to experience staying in a youth hostel.. checked a lot of reviews about this place.. and found this place amazing.. the gentleman at the front office was always smiling and so enthusiastic.. m sure he loves his job.. gave me details about the place.. a map.. welcome drink.. chilled beer and yes thanks for the amazing pasta at dinner.. loved it.. would surely love to come back
hotelName:
8    Ostello Bello Grande
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I had trepidation staying at a hostel as never had in the past but I was pleasantly surprised. It was clean, well run and fun. The people staying there were of varying ages but all had the common theme of being friendly. It was nice speaking to fellow travelers in a welcoming environment. I would recommend staying here. I selected the room with shower.
hotelName:
8    Ostello Bello Grande
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: From my first step, I was welcomed with a smile, like if I was entering my house visiting old friends. This is the best welcome I have received in Europe since one year. Great energy, professionalism. I just stayed one night, but every moment was nice. Free breakfast, lunch available, warm inside, cosy bed. Very clean, perfectly located. Thank you for being such a great hostel!
hotelName:
8    Ostello Bello Grande
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: (31 male from Israel) Spent a couple of nights in a dorm late Oct. 2018. Very friendly and helpful staff, easy check-in/out process. Easy access hostel from main train station (and therefore also from airport). Arriving you receive a free drink. Breakfast as well as dinner are included and very nice! Many, lounge areas, useful facilities and options to rent any forgotten accessory (towel, padlock etc.).Only downside the entire stay was during my second and last night where one of the hostel guests made horrible noise, shouting, running up and down the hostel as well as in and out, sounding the fire alarm, etc. this continued until breakfast, where he arrived shirtless and drunk, annoying the rest of the guests. Sadly, the staff did nothing to stop this!
hotelName:
8    Ostello Bello Grande
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I have to spend one night in Milan because of one flight so I decided to stay near Milano centrale. I thought that it will be far but with the metro station close to it you can go everywhere (metro ticket for 24 hours is just 4,5 euro). You can go walking to the bosco verticale.Besides the location, this hostel provides you everything. You will have something to eat 24/7! For free.The staff is very good and it has a beautiful terrace.If you are in milano you definitly have to choose ostello bello!
hotelName:
8    Ostello Bello Grande
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: (I’m a 24 year-old guy from the US) Stayed here for 2 nights with my brother in a 6-person mixed dorm. The rooms are basic, with two 3-story bunk beds, and a small bathroom. The beds and linens I had were clean and didn’t show any stains. The showers were small but the water pressure was great. Overall, the rooms were standard and well-kept.It is located extremely close to Milano Centrale and the Metro station there which makes getting around very easy. They have fun activities every night (Karaoke was a big party) plus breakfast and dinner and a full bar. The food is average, but it works in a pinch and saves you money. We made great friends from other countries here, and if I’m ever back in Milan I will absolutely be staying again. Can’t say enough good things about Ostello Bello Grande!
hotelName:
8    Ostello Bello Grande
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My opinion hostel is overrating, always wanted to tray hostel and i choosed them for they rating. What i like: Location and thats allWhat i don’t like:1. Staff, they seems friendly, but i think they don’t know how to work and organise. There are a lot of situasions and they don’t know how to stand it .. for such rating hostel they must be much more educated. 2. Breakfast ... offul (coffee :(3. Rooms not so clean as they anouns So if you are a student and don’t have money it’s your choise ... but if you want just to find intresting place ... sorry it’s not right choice
hotelName:
8    Ostello Bello Grande
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I never stay hostel in my life and Ostello Bello Grande is the best choice i ever made. Staff and the people there so friendly and fun. If i come back to Milan. for sure this is the Hostel i will pick. I would like to say thank Federico for helping me to cut the pad lock at my bag, the most embarrassing moment in my life LOL. but u safe my day thank you Federico.
hotelName:
8    Ostello Bello Grande
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: In many ways a typical hostel. No luxury, except for the rooftop terass on a sunny day, but very well planned and organized. Amazing that breakfast and dinner is included in the price, and a welcome drink. The bar is a real bar that also attracts local students. Informational signs everywhere reminding people of basic things (so many are ignorant of such). Great kitchen on a separate floor from the dining and pub area. Very good vibes here and definitively one of the best. (I've been to more beautiful hostels, but when they lack social life they are boring.This one gave a very good impression.)
hotelName:
8    Ostello Bello Grande
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I had missed my flight out of Venice and had to take a flight out of Milan the next morning. On the train to Milan, I decided to look for places to spend the night instead of heading straight to the airport. That's when I stumbled upon this gem. What a good decision it was... I got a twin room for a very affordable price. After a short walk across form Milano Central, I arrived at the hostel to be welcomed by three very friendly front desk staff. They made me feel at home immediately. The check in process was breeze and the room was absolutely awesome. Clean, nice decor, balcony, quiet, comfortable. The bar area with free food and a free beer was a nice perk. The garden in the back was very nice and so was the game room in the basement. This place is everything that a hotel can never be and then some. I highly recommend this place to everyone visiting Milan. I'm glad I gotto experience this wonderful place and I'll surely stay here again if I go back to Milan.
hotelName:
8    Ostello Bello Grande
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very close to public transports. Train station, underground and bus to airports are 2 minutes walking. Clean rooms and friendly staff. I had to go to see a concert and they help me quite a lot. In the bar area there is FREE food! ...even at night there are some biscuits. Cool place!
hotelName:
8    Ostello Bello Grande
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This was my first hostel as a solo traveller which really put me at ease for my Italy travels.The reception staff were friendly and informative. I asked where I could buy some toiletries and they provided me with some for free which lasted my whole 8 day trip. Bonus!The free breakfast and evening meal were great value - plenty of choices and very filling. On an evening the bar area was very social . I enjoyed chatting to people from all over the world and was nice to have interaction with being solo. The bedrooms and bathrooms were clean and had everything you needed - charging points, light and storage at side of bed as well as huge draw under the beds. I had my own padlock but you could use one of the hostels if you didn't have one. The only thing I would say is I can't remember if I saw a plug socket in the room for straightening hair or anything like that other than the bed sockets. Towels were provided which was fab.Location was perfect as 5 minute walk to the train station and a 25 minute walk into centre of Milan.I've already recommended this place to friends and would happily return here again :) thank you!
hotelName:
8    Ostello Bello Grande
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Friendly and available stuff.Breakfast well-furnished and free drinks to welcome us. The whole Hostel with its design highlights the topic of travellers who can consider this place a safe one. So, travellers have to follow some rules how if they were in their second home for real. Double room is really cleaned. Fantastic night in the common area with beers, music and board games. We will back here for an other time in Milan. Thank you. ♥️
hotelName:
8    Ostello Bello Grande
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Me and my daughter did a little quick backpack through italy and were on a budget, so we decided to stay here based on proximity to the train station. (It was our first time in Italy and didn’t know our way around yet) All the amenities made it quite worthwhile when choosing it over a hotel. The staff was incredible and on-site bar was so convenient for soft drinks. The large under bed lockers were amazing and could fit my whole midsize non carryon size luggage plus a backpack and were extremely secure. I felt very safe here with my 13 year old daughter and also showed her what a great experience staying in a hostel can be! If ever in Milan I will 100% be staying here again!
hotelName:
8    Ostello Bello Grande
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Just The Best hotel, espesially for value for money. A huge clean room. Comfortable bed. High design reception as well as room. Unlimited tea, coffee and water (cold, natural or sparkling). Very friendy stuff. Resolved any my question. Highly reccomend. To my mind - the sample of ideal hotel.
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Here my personal experience (after 3 non consecutive stays):- very good location (close to the train station but not too close to live in a stress environment)- room very very big- clean, clean and clean- very calm / no noisy (important criteria for me)- friendly welcome (always a nice chat or smile when I arrive or come back)- feeling of be treated as a guest and not as ‘an opportunity to squeeze as max as possible’- good value for moneySome suggestion. One of the two lift is very slow.It will be worth to check if there are opportunity for speed. A city maps and tours guide available at coffee area.
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I resided at this establishment for 6 months from February.Best value spacious spotless and well situated.The manager Francisco and his staff went out of their way to help and accommodate all our needs and we felt at home.Can only highly recommend.
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very nice, clean and quiet hotel near a central train station. Staff was polite and helpful.wifi was fast and everything worked fine. Free coffee anf cookies in th3e reception. Also the hotel had umbrellas free to borrow if it had rained.
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We were on our way to Verona so only stopped one night here, but we would really like to come again. This place was very stylish, clean and comfortable and also great value. The welcome was great. We found a fantastic local pizza restaurant with no tourists (hooray!). and it was a short walk into town.
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: my second visit, the hotel is well maintained. value for money, easy access to the train station, friendly staff. the room is big enough for 3 persons, recommend to any family who travel to Milan. walking distance to the main tourist spots
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location closer to Milano Centrale station. Very clean, comfortable and roomy place. Lots of amenities, home away from home for our family (2-adults; 2-kids). The staff were friendly and accommodating. Will return back for sure.
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a wonder stay at Residenza Delle Città. The hotel itself is within an 8 minute walk to Milano Centrale. This was perfect since we could take easy day trips to Varenna/ Bellagio, Bergamo, Genoa etc. we were also able to catch a direct train to Nice,France which suited us perfectly. Within Milan, though cans are affordable, we enjoyed a 40 minute walk to see the Duomo and enjoyed window shopping in that area. The hotel accommodations themselves were perfect. They were roomy, very modern and all amenities were thoughtfully provided. Best of all we enjoyed the Nespresso coffee and cookies that were available 24/7!-Dattaray’s August 2019
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Loved it here! Next to central station, rooms were clean and modern and big, and the reception area with the water and coffee and sitting area was a nice touch. Would definitely recommend it! The lady at reception was also super friendly.
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Fantastic hotel. Very welcoming and friendly staff. Room was large, beds comfortable and very nice with AC in the summer heat. We will stay again for sure. Very clean and well looked after. It is very very convenient to Milano Centrale.
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Our family of 4 used this property as our "home in Italy" for our summer vacation/holiday. It is very very convenient to Milano Centrale train station which is incredibly well connected such that you can take non-stop high speed trains everywhere. The area is a mix of urban/residential feel and is just perfect. If you want to go into the city center of Milan, the metro is also very convenient. Lots of restaurants, shops, stores, everything you would need very close by. Most importantly, the management and staff at this hotel treat you like family and go way out of their way to ensure you have everything you need including fantastic recommendations and arrangements. For example, Franceso really took his time to setup a private pasta making class which was customized to be vegetarian for us and at a five star hotel for a very reasonable price. The experience was amazing. He also took a call from me at 3am when our car service did not arrive and we were worried because of tight timing for an international flight, and worked things out and we made it no problem. That is amazing service. Michael is also excellent and helped us in so many ways. We had a family apartment which was extremely clean and comfortable for a family of four. We ate out a lot but a few nights we got take away and ate at the kitchen table and it felt like home. They also have a nice gym which I took advantage of many mornings, both weights and cardio equipment. The lobby also makes it feel like your home every time you come in. There is an espresso machine you can use anytime, also some cookies/biscuits, and there is a fridge from which you can take water bottles at your convenience as if it were your own. I just saw that Milan was selected for the 2026 Winter Olympics. I might make my reservation here in advance! :)
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My studio was spacious featuring a bathroom with full bathtub, kitchen, fridge, living area and bedroom, and the reception area was always well stocked with a Nepresso machine, biscuits and mineral water. The front desk staff was proficient in English and immensely helpful, helping to give directions and even storing my luggage before the check in time and after the check out time. The hotel is very accessible, just a short 10 minute walk to Milano Centrale, Caiazzo and Loreto stations, and it also can be reached by the No 1 Tram.
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We were not disappointed with this place. We traveled by train from Rome and the location was 10 mins from the train station. The walk was not that bad considering we have our luggages with us. The place is very clean, equipped with kitchenette ; conduction stove, microwave, water heater, in the main lobby they have coffee maker with daily supply of coffee and tea with cookies. I like the feel of the hotel, it feels like home away from home. Michael the staff helped us a lot, genuinely accomodating. We will surely booked this place again .
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed here for a night as we made our way down to Florence. Good experience - they called us to make sure we were coming for check-in as we came a bit later. Rooms were nice and clean, included a kitchen and sitting area and reasonable finish-out. Friendly staff and free water were nice bonuses as well.
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A few blocks from the Stazione Centrale this hotel/suites is perfect in every way. The receptionist, Mr. Francesco Tolles, was exceptionally professional, friendly and full of information for an efficient Milan visit. The junior suite was comfortable for 3 adults in 2 separate spaces, kitchen, large bath. High quality materials and furnishings with attention to style are used throughout. It did feel like home. Thank you Francesco!
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellent location close by the station, fantastic room and super clean! Michael was super attentive and customer service oriented, i strongly recommends this hotel, you feel at home, super quiet area, love it! Will return!
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: close to Milan Central Station, this place was perfect for our short transit stay, but would also be good for a longer stop as it had a well equipped kitchen. Very comfortable and airy, and the staff are very friendly and helpful.
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Let me start by saying that the property is more like apartments but they are large and nicely furnished and well appointed.We were welcomed by Francesco, who was extremely nice and very professional.The location of the property is 7-10min walk from the entrance to the central station and is primarily in a residential area between two busy roads.The room has a stove, fridge and microwave.The room and bathroom were very clean and well presented.My only issue was the temperature of the room was not in the control of the guest. My room was 26 degrees Celsius all night but the air outside was not hot and there was no way to operate the air conditioner or reduce the heat.Francesco explained to us this was outside of his control due to regulation and the whole property was like this so he offered to circulate the air. This did nothing and the fan was not operational. He offered to move is to another property or open windows in the room. As the alternative property was not in a location I needed I opted to try and sleep in the room.The room was still too hot with the windows open (still 26C) and extremely noisy and we were unable to sleep at all. We opted to leave the property the next morning extremely tired.Francesco was very professional and asked us not provide a negative review.This is my honest response and review of this property so please consider this as constructive Francesco . I travel a lot for my job and live in hotels 60% of my year.This is a nice property and the staff are very good. However the heat to me in the room was excessive. It is not the heat of Milan as I live in the Middle East without issues.Please address the problem with the air and you will have an ideal property. There may be a restriction on providing cool air but the heat needs to be turned off or controllable. If a guest is unable to sleep then this is fundamental.It is the only thing that would stop me returning. Thank you Francesco for your support and professionalism but please rectify this as it is spoiling your property.
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Upon our arrival; Francesco attended and took care of our check in and needs as if we were his very first clients. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at this top shelf establishment. Francesco definitely made an excellent experience, phenomenal. My wife and I are customers for life and we would highly recommend staying there.
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Situated on a quiet street around a 5 minute walk from the airport shuttle drop-off points the Residenza della Citta was perfect for our 4 night stay in Milan. The reception staff were extremely helpful and the free hot drinks and chilled bottled water were a welcome surprise. The gym is spacious and well equipped; WiFi service was excellent and our room and all the communal areas were spotlessly clean.
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It’s around 10 mins walk from train station. The lobby is well decorated and inviting. The room is very well decorated, the bed is comfortable. It’s my most pleasant stay through my trip in Italy. They provides stoves, pots, knife, free flow complimentary water, coffee machine (lobby) and biscuits(lobby). The nearest supermarket is around 10 mins walk. Will definitely stay at this accommodation again should I return to Milan.
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: great room! great location! great price. And an amazing host. Very, very nice place. We were able to get around everywhere from this property. Close to Milan Centrale, too! We really enjoyed our stay here and would stay again!
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: What a superb stay ! We've just spent 4 nights in this well located establishment and everything was perfect. The staff is lovely, helpful and very courteous (many thanks to Francesco), the accommodation deserves 4 stars on hotel standards, everything being very clean, comfortable, modern and nicely decorated. Bottles of water (sparkly too), candy, cookies and nespresso coffees are available in the lobby at all times which is a very nice touch ! I travel a lot and if I were to come back to Milan, i will definitely go back here !
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had an excellent stay. The check in staff were very friendly and the hotel was beautiful and well maintained. Our room was very clean. We were upgraded to a suite with a 2nd floor loft, it would be great for a big group or a family. The whirlpool tub was fantastic. There was a heated towel rack and the toiletries were so very cute. We only stayed 1 night and we're trying to get over the jet lag of coming from US. The windows had great blackout curtains!!! They have a very small parking lot which we were able to park in.Downsides: The hallways are beautiful marble but they echo.The blow dryers in the room aren't the best quality, bring your own if you have longer hair. And the bath is beautiful, but it comes with a handheld wand you have to hold over your head to shower. This is probably normal in Europe, and was more of an issue for my bf who is tall.
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I came with my dog and kids and everything was well organized by the hotel.The staff at the reception are so helpful and dealing with situations that arose. My wallet got stolen and the staff were great and helpful .The location is very good because metro is not far and train station is close. Its easy to park your car in an gated area. Rooms are spacious and perfect for a family. Many thanks to the superb friendly staff .
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is a great place to stay near everything ,central station 5min walk, great shopping at 5 min walk. The room is super , small kitchenette with nicely equipped. The staff is very nice will do everything to please you. No negatives in this nice place.
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: When I arrived at this small hotel I immediately felt at home. I was given a warm welcome in the reception area where tea, coffee and snacks are available day and night. Then I was shown to my beautifully appointed studio apartment. There was a large, well appointed bathroom, comfortable bed and small kitchen area. Lots of windows let in plenty of light but there were sheer curtains for privacy. The front gate was locked at night so I felt secure. My door key fitted the front door so if I had wanted to stay out later I could get in with no problem. The person on the front desk was able to give me directions and information about transport around Milan. He also made recommendations about what to see. It was perfect for me travelling alone but a couple would find it comfortable as well. Only 10 minutes walk from the railway station it was very convenient. There was a supermarket close by and a great selection of restaurants as well. I stayed three nights initially then a few weeks later I was so pleased I was able to spend another night before I left Italy to go home. I couldn’t recommend a better place to spend time in Milan.
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Residenza delle Citta is a lovely place to stay in Milan! Rooms are large and location wise staying here means you're well connected to main attractions and the station. The little touches have also been thought about making the stay extra comfortable.
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed in the apartment a few days. The rooms are very comfortable and stylishly decorated. Rooms are cleaned every day. The kitchen is fully equipped. At the reception there is always tea, coffee, mineral water, biscuits. From the train station 10 minutes on foot. There are many shops and restaurants nearby. Wonderful Aparthotel. Hope to return.
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Impeccable reception, huge rooms, very clean and comfortable, few minutes walk from Central station. Good sleep, very quiet. There is an equipped kitchenette. Nearby few good restaurants. Highly recommend to families
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: An exceptionally convenient location for us visiting family in Milan. The Residenza is clean, modern, has all the amenities you need. It is located near to metro but we walked everywhere. It's a 35/40 minute walk to the Duomo or La Scala. A 15 minute walk from Milano Centrale Statio. Coffee shop located nearby but the coffee and biscuits in lounge area of the Residence sufficed for us.Highly recommended. We will return.
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We loved the Hotel studio apartment the moment we saw it. It was very spacious, as we were 3 adults and a child. The main room had large bed with partition and dressing mirror. The living room also had a spacious bed which had could accommodate 3 people. The bathroom had amenities and toiletries. The staff was very courteous and helpful. There is no restaurant, so no breakfast is available. Drinking water is also available.
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location is perfect, it's located working distance to the train station. The room is good, especially the night we were back from Roma. We were arranged in the penthouse which has two floors. My kids were very excited. They said that this was the best hotel ever although they stayed in 5 stars hotel before. They run up and down. My husband and I enjoyed cups of wine in the balcony. Everything is perfect.
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is an amazing place to stay. It’s quiet, it’s dark and the apartments are just beautiful. I highly recommend a stay here, you will not be disappointed. It’s close to some great local restaurants and public transport.
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Residenza del Citta is a different, slightly quirky place that offers a good option compared to the big hotels. In a quiet street near to the main train station. We had a large room with bedroom and sitting area, big bathroom, very clean, free water and coffee. Would stay there again
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed for one night while in Milano and wish we had more night to stay! We had a beautiful loft that was very well equipped, very clean, comfortable bed and even had a terrace! The gentleman at the front desk was very accommodating and help schedule our taxi for 4:30am the next morning ( tax was on time too). Great location to the metro and train station. I work in a luxury hotel in Miami so I’m quite picky when it comes to myself and I would highly recommend this place. Hope you come visit again soon!
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: What a charming place to stay! I’m at the last leg of my trip through Italy and this is definitely a great way to end it on a high note. If I ever come back to Milan I’ll be coming to this hotel again. Gorgeous apts and Michael was a wonderful host. Location is convenient (close to Milan Central station and the metro) yet you’re not in the heart of everything, so it’s nice and quiet. Luxurious for solo travelers, perfect for couples/families.
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Absolutely love this place. Michael was so very helpful with everything. Accommodations amenities location everything was fantastic. It was so nice to have bottles of water fresh coffee or tea and a little cookie whenever you wanted it. Love the Decor & the huge bathroom. Can’t say enough about the hospitality and help from all staff. Great Wi-Fi connection.Will come here again on return trip to Milan.
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We were recommended by a friend and the apartment lived up to our expectations. The staff are very helpful and the apartment was clean. I liked the coffee station at reception and the fact that there was milk and bottled water available for guests even though there were tea/coffee making facilities in the room. Ask at reception for the quickest route to the station - we didn’t find this until the last day!
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel was clean, secure and modern with easy access to bus and train routes. The staff were friendly and helpful. We had a room with a large tub/shower combination which was really nice after a day of sightseeing. Close to many cafes, restaurants, bars. I would stay here again.
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: All we needed was a place to stay near the train station, but we got a really great experience as well. Everything is new and clean, and unique--not "cookie-cutter" sameness. It's only a few blocks from the station and is between a couple of useful metro stops. It's pretty quiet, though. We felt perfectly safe and relaxed.
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is definitely the best hotel we have ever visited. Very service-minded staff, ideal cleanliness, fresh and well-equipped kitchen. On top of that, we got an apartment on the top floor with a large terrace offering a stunning view of the neighbourhood. Well, here you feel like home!
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Pietro couldn't be nicer! Such a nice stay. Kitchen has everything you need. Great quality, not old and useless which is sometimes the case when you have "a kitchen". Induction oven and everything. Free cold water, coffee, tea from the lobby and really spacious apartments. Good and stable WiFi. Cleaning was great. You get your key and it feels like you live there. Perfect location, walking distance to awesome TripAdvisor top spots and the metro just a short walk away. Basic and excellent! Also tried the gym which was nicer than expected with TechnoGym equipment (good brand). It's like getting a key to your own apartment in the city. Very private and on a quiet street. Perfect for our stay.
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: First of all, please all pay attention to the check-in riles: front desk closes at 8pm - I didn’t when booking, and caused some trouble to the receptionnist who made sure to be there around midnight. Really appreciated that move, as I know we didn’t play it by the rules. That and the absence of breakfast are probably the only 2 things that differentiate this “residenzia” from a 4* hotel. On the facility side of things, the room was decorated with taste, and clean. Rain shower, large bathtub, kitchen, sofa, etc. All perfect. If we hadn’t got 2 nights booked elsewhere after that, I’d definitely would have spent my whole stay at Residenza delle Citta. Don’t hesitate one second.
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed one night in a family apartment. It was well set up for our 2 adults and two teen-aged children. Everything was comfortable and it was sparklingly clean. The hotel manager was helpful and friendly.
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This was a great place to spend a couple of days whilst visiting friends. Although the check-in needed a phone-call, the welcome a settling-in process was smooth and the manager ensured that all our needs were met. The apartment was excellent, clean, quiet and tastefully furnished. We will return!
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Our family stayed here for a quick overnight trip to Milan on our way to the Riviera and were thoroughly pleased with everything. The reception was exceptional, room was clean and modern, breakfast bar was nice and convenient. Staff was very helpful with check in and out as well as giving advice about transportation, restaurant recommendations and such. Location is great for trains, trams and metro so easy to get anywhere in the city. Highly recommend if you're in Milan.
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good value for money given the nice decor and proximity to Centrale railway (compared to other nearby hotels we’ve searched). A very nicely decorated hotel with happy bright colors just like in the photos, plus a pleasant fragrance that puts a smile on your face as you walk in after a long journey. Free coffee, tea and cookies at the lounge, free still / sparking water in fridge at all times. Friendly professional and efficient staff. We were double lucky to get early check-in before 11am and a free upgrade to a suite room on top floor. 10-15min walk to Centrale railway and metro (metro platforms are a bit further down south FYI), a fine stroll on good weather day but may feel a bit far if you are in a rush or in rain. A few cafe and restaurants around the corner, convenient for morning pastries, though not particularly great.
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is very close to the Milano Centrale Station. The rooms are huge for European standards and the service is impeccable. There is free tea/coffee throughout the day. A special shout out to Pietro who was ever so kind and helpful!
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My friend and I stayed at this hotel for two nights. We were welcomed very kindly by the host who also gave us a map and pointed out the places of interest, which was very useful.The room we stayed in was fairly big and had a comfortable bed. There was a small kitchen with a stove and fridge. A nice, clean bathroom where the towels were provided together with mini seized shampoo, conditioner, and soap. At the entrance you could take free bottles of water, cookies, coffee and thee.It was basically anything we needed and a little more for our trip to MilanWithin 5 minutes from the hotel you could find the subway to the shopping center, but you could also walk for about 30 minutes and still be entertained by all the shops.
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It does feel like home.. It's a great place to stay in a great neighborhood of Milan. Beautiful, spacious and clean facility, quiet neighborhood but also very central and safe, a welcoming host and helpful staff..
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We felt like as we come back to home from when we step into the hotel entrance. The manager was very kund and friendly. Welcomed us like inviting us to his home. Not only the room but everywhere in the hotel were clean and well maintained. Matresses for sofa and extra bed were very thick and confortable. We will definately come back!
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The manager at this charming hotel went out of his way to make us feel welcomed. This was our first trip to Milan and we didn't have a clue. He was tremendously helpful and made us feel at home. The rooms are very cute, clean, and roomy. The location was very close to the train station, which was handy. I recommend this hotel without wholeheartedly!
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Clean and big for an apartment. Hotel was accommodating to allow early check in as we arrived very early and kids were tired after a long overnight flight. Location is convenient though not in city center, but ideal for those travelling by train.
hotelName:
9    Residenza delle Citta
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Requested king/queen bed and had 2 small twin beds, very hard mattress and flat pillows! My husband said he felt like he was in the hospital. The room was clean, we had a small frig with complimentary bottles of water. Staff was nice. There was a nice garden area. We were there one night on the way home so had to be up early and did not do breakfast.
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel was a nice, boutique facility. Highlights included a breakfast patio, large back garden with lounge chairs and a nice lobby, lounge and breakfast buffet. The superior room left a bit to be desired. While the size of room was sufficient, the laminate flooring meant when one or two people sat on the bed with their backs against the headboard the bed quickly slid away from the wall. When an attempt was made to lock the wheel on the bed leg, the whole leg came off the bed. The beds are extremely firm. The toilet either consistently filled or, after repeated flushing, finally achieved a proper seal and stopped running. Bottom line: the room was not up to the perceived standard of the hotel.
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The title of this review summarized my wife & I stay at this hotel. Good location, Excellent Breakfast, Friendly Staff, Good value for money. 3 night stay. Negotiated nightly parking rate down to 10 euros which was a bonus. Would definitely recommend to others.
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very clean and fancy location! Every one was very friendly and they can get you a taxi asap! Great and modern location in residential area across the street to the subway Great room size and very modern!
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Absolutely loved our trip to Milan! Location was perfect - convenient to Metro and tons within walking distance. The hotel was absolutely spectacular. Amazing service, beautiful lobby and grounds, wonderful breakfast. Completely perfect!
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: + Super close to subway+ Beautiful lobby and public space in the hotel, also a nice calm park in the city+ Good breakfast- Prvate bathrooms are outdated, so the marble has some stains and smaller damages
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It was a wonderful hotel in a wonderful neighbourhood, 10 minutes walking to Tre Tori shoppng center and only 1 minute walk to metro station Buonarroti. Friendly staff, clean room, wonderful view of the back garden are compiling the fantastic image I got from this hotel. The only minus I found, it was the old bathtub that needs renovation/trnasformation to a shower. If it is in your budget range, you should give it a try.
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Location very good near underground station which can take you in the city center. You can reach Linate airport by underground and bus from Duomo. Rooms are very good and neat and clean. Front desk staff good.Breakfast very good. and the staff is very good and helpful and always smiling,
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Three members of my family stayed at this hotel in early August 2019. It was a great value in a residential area. Local shops and restaurants close by, metro station steps from the front door. Friendly and courteous, helpful staff. Very nice facility, great breakfast, beautiful backyard. Fairly close to major city centers in Milan. The only thing I could complain about was WIFI in our room. There was none. It did however work perfect in the lobby. Since we had cellular data service it was minor issue. Overall...Highly recommend!
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Its hard to find in Milano rooms that are ample, this hotel is located, not in downtown, but in one of the nicest areas of the town. Rooms large enough, GREAAT breakfast, and an amazing garden in the back. Great stay. The service was great, I requested a hairdryer and it LITERALLY arrived in 2 minutes.
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Everyone was super nice and had great customer service. The rooms were clean and the beds were a great size. I very much enjoyed the complimentary waters in the mini fridge. The breakfast buffet was beautifully laid out with a wide variety of food and the kitchen staff were beyond polite. Great hotel
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: From check in to check out this hotel ticked all the boxes. Staff, rooms, gardens, breakfast and bar all met with approval. Immaculately clean and friendly staff. Very close to metro and close by to tram network. Nice to come back to the calm after a hard day's siteseeing.
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We loved our stay at Hotel Tiziano. An incredibly hospitable staff. Beautiful garden area and outdoor patios with comfortable seating. Perfect for a relaxing glass of wine or cocktail after dinner. The bar has a nice selection and friendly bartenders. Our room was clean and quiet. The Metro is just a few steps away. The neighborhood is perfect for a relaxing stroll. We will definitely return...maybe even before the end of the year.5 Stars to Hotel Tiziano ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Had very positive stay with helpful and friendly staff, rooms were spotless and comfortable.Location felt safe and easy to find.Beds were also comfy for a good night sleep after a busy day on my feet!No hesitation to book again or recommend.
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is a walking distance from the Milano Congressi. It is located on a quiet street and a few feet away from the Metro. The room I stayed was small was just the right size for me. It had everything I needed - it was actually very well designed. The breakfast was fabulous! From fruits, to yogurt to breads, ham and cheese and eggs it had a great variety. The waiters/waitresses worked hard to get everyone their coffees. The reception area and the year are well kept. The staff is very pleasant. I will stay here again if in the area.
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very nice and central place. Good customer service , clean rooms and nice breakfast. It is very close to the metro station! Would totally recommend this place and would go back and stay there. Very nice garden even for children because it had a playground
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This was a high class property with excellent service yet appealed to our average pocketbooks. We had a wonderful stay. You will not believe the breakfast buffet. It is a lovely presentation with many different taste delights. You will like Hotel Tiziano!
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great hotel with good service, friendly staff, great breakfast area, near the metro. One unpleasant impression in my room at night was the work of a washing machine that prevented sleep. For me there was a low-power hair dryer - I had to dry my hair for about an hour ....
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Couldn't have been better...Ideal for a small-ish hotel. Breakfast was just excellent, wifi was great, room was nicely laid out and really clean. My particular room had a patio. Location was generally good--close to metro, walkable to historic area if you like to walk.
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice, modern hotel in a very good location. Rooms are minimalist but well equipped and a good size with comfortable bed. Slightly bizarre shower that was difficult to get in. Breakfast selection great and staff very nice.
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Everything was perfect Very friendly, clean and beautiful garden. Breakfast was also very fresh and delicious. Even vegan options available-lots of fresh fruits etc. Can definitely recommend this hotel.
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is in a great location (next to the metro) and is just as it looks in the photos. You have to book the breakfast too because is delicious, various and a great deal too. I asked at the moment of the booking for a quite room because very tired from the trip but anyhow they gave me a room next to the elevator and window on the street side. This is my only disappointment with the structure but anyway I strongly recommend the hotel
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed two nights here upon arriving in Italy from home. The hotel is clean and quiet. Our room faces the street and did have street noise, but was not too bad. The breakfast is delicious with strong coffee, homemade yogurt machine, and everything else you would expect. There is a nice fitness center with yoga room-and the setting is like a garden oasis. The hotel is next to the metro with easy and quick access to the duomo and everything else in Milan. Will stay here again!
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is well located in Milano, in a quaint residential neighborhood, and close to subway stops. However, having paid almost 400euros for a night, I expected a bit better, without expecting a luxury hotel. On the pictures attached (taken April 2019), you will find a hair dryer which I had not seen in any hotel rooms for many years, as well as a thin plastic bathtub which was very difficult to hop on in, although I am a skinny person! Bathrooms desperately need renovation. The room itself was spacious and well furnished, but without any particular decoration, felt a bit uncozy.Would look for a better value for money next time.
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Tiziano is a great hotel to stay with lovely people and a fantastic breakfast! Distance to various parts in Milano is good to do with the metro. Room is a little bit small but quality is good. They also have a great garden to relax and stay.
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: i have stayed many times in Milan due to business and Hotel Tizano has to be the best i have stayed in, the Hotel has everything any traveller should need, the location is ideal, close to many restaurants and a small walk to the centre of Milan, i would recommend Hotel Tiziano to anyone visiting Milan, well worth a stay and is a 5 star all day long, i personally will be staying here in the distance future,
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: clean , grgeat staff , great location , spacious rooms good breakfast , very good value for money and impeccable hotel staff friendly atmosphere , beautiful garden views , quiet surroundings and near local transport
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Loved this place and its little garden in back. Its in a great location just a couple blocks away from many restaurants and shops. Right next to a subway stop that will take all around the city. The breakfast is great to get the morning going. Staff was professional and friendly. The room was nice and comforting with great wifi. If i go back to Milan I will stay here again.
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel is in a great location, close to Metro and Wagner. Reception OK. Sometimes very helpful but not all times. I stayed in a Room Classico. VERY small room and TINY shower for a 4 star hotel. Clean room. The room was VERY stuffy. The window closes and noise from the street. I didn't sleep well. You hear noises from other rooms…….coughing and phones. Breakfast was however EXCELLENT.
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We visited Milano in February and stayed just one night at Hotel Tiziano, walking distance to the church of Santa Maria della Grazie (Last Supper). We arrived, checked in and then headed out for the church. The staff was helpful in giving us directions to the church, but we did get a little lost. The hotel is very beautiful. When you walk in to the lobby you see a lovely view of the green lawn in a park setting through a big picture window. The lobby has a reading room and guest computer area. The hotel was very quiet on a side street away from major traffic. Our room was very clean and had also had a big picture window which faced out to the street and some lovely apartment houses across the road. The bed was just a double, which felt small because we are used to a bigger bed, but everything in the room was spotless, and the bathroom was also very clean and modern.
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I always stay at Hotel Tiziano when I'm in Milan and love every second of it! The hotel itself is beautiful with its reading rooms and garden and huge windows that overlook it. Breakfast is varied and delicious with lots of sweet and savoury foods to choose from. The rooms are super clean and very comfortable and nothing is too much trouble for the staff. Thank you all!
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Incredibly helpful staff and beautiful premises. The hotel even has a new gym, and a beautiful garden. Rooms are not big but very comfortable, clean and modern. Breakfast buffet is lovely! Will come here again!
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel really suits my needs as very close to where my daughter lives,convenient for metro, just a few stops to centre.Just need to sort equipment for hot breakfast,Rooms clean and comfortable, a kettle to make a cuppa would be nice.
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Loved the location , the cleanliness of the hotel , the breakfast is awesome with so many varieties. Will stay again in this Hotel. We got a room facing a garden situated in the back of the Hotel. The service is awesome.
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel, which is located about 20 minutes by subway from the dowtown/Duomo, is really best for people that have business at the Milan Convention Center (MiCo), which is a very pleasant 15-minute walk from the hotel. The hotel itself is functional but rather utilitarian. That said, the staff is wonderful. They were so helpful to us & had a great command of English. Francesco at reception was especially helpful and professional. We also liked the breakfast and the young women who served us cappucinos and refilled the buffet. They also gave us good recommendations on things to do in Milan. Like I said, do not expect a 5-star hotel room by any means, but our room was clean and functional. Also, the neighborhood is a very attractive residential neighborhood with a lot of small, leafy apartment buildings, restaurants, and some supermarkets. I would stay there again if I had to be at MiCo, but otherwise I think I would choose a more modern or luxurious hotel near the city center.
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Exceeded expectations.This hotel is in a great area close to the metro which is easy to navigate and the breakfast was high quality.Having travelled to Italy previously this hotel is a lot higher quality than previous experiences
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is in great location, I will stay in this hotel again. Excellent services for everything!!!I will also recommend it to my friends when they visit Milan.Room is large and bright, I like it very much!
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My stay in Hotel Tiziano was better than I expected because the price was low and there was free gym training for my stay, the hotel staff were helpful when I needed help, the location of the hotel is a bit outside the city but with 10 minutes on metro you will be in the center of Milano :)
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We were most taken by the wonderfully attentive staff, but the rooms are quite adequate with good internet service. Dining nearby is quite varied and the Buonarroti metro stop will take you quickly to center city. Prices close to center are obscene, so the prices here are a welcome relief. They have a wonderful garden area in back for nice weather relaxation
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stay here at least 2 times a year to visit family. The rooms are small but clean with very good service and reasonable prices. The morning buffet breakfast is always a welcome sight.The location is near the Metro.. and walking distance to some very nice restaurants. WiFi is included and they have a small bar should you care for an afternoon aperitif. We will be back.
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellent location and very friendly staff, clean rooms, sleep quality. I have been in this hotel 2 years ago and I have very positive experience. I will recommend everybody to stay in hotel Tiziano. The best in Milano
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Easily checked in on arrival, even though I arrived earlier. The staff was pleasant, helpful and professional. Always goes an extra step to help and they pay attention to detail. The room was clean and bright. The bed was comfortable, room safe easy to use, and the room air conditioning, wifi and tv all worked well. Breakfast was buffet style and good as reviewed. The location is great next to a metro station; transit links to elsewhere. I would definitely revisit and recommend.
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is an old residence, nicely refurbished in a superb building with large spaces and big and nice garden. Quiet and clean. Good location, very close to the metro station. Nice staff, good breakfast, good sleep. I recommend.
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Spent a week at this hotel. We were on the first floor facing the back. The room was great! The staff was very friendly and accommodating. Breakfast was also good (with the exception of one morning where the eggs really tasted like powdered eggs), but the variety of items offered are terrific. I would think there is a little bit of something for every taste.The beds were comfy, and the room is well appointed. The metro is literally a one or two minute walk. There is a shopping center maybe a 10 minute walk one direction and the other has a market area. There are ATM'S (bankomat) close by.The restaurant across the street has pretty decent food.The only caution for our trip was some stupid chicks tried to pick-pocket my husband on the metro-escalator. A. We learned along time ago, you don't leave valuables in a back pocket or side cargo pocket. B. Always be aware who is touching you n where. C. Apparently, a lot of folks are always in hurry and think nothing of bumping into you or pushing ahead of you in line. No, southern hospitality there...lol. We would definitely come back to this hotel and stay. Cheers!
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I was here for 6 nights. It is right in front of the red M1 metro line which connects to all other lines and trains. It was a breeze to go anywhere. I took the Shuttle Malenpsa from Malpensa MXP airport to Central Station(50 minutes) then hopped on M3 to M1 metro (20 minutes) Buonarroti stop. The lobby is spacious with places to sit outside in a beautiful courtyard. If you walk down the street from hotel stay to left, there are resturants, a Dominoes on the corner and a grocery store about 5 minute walk Auburge (spell?). Breakfast was good with alot of variety. I would stay here again. I was here August 28 to September 4th.
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Our stay at the hotel for a weekend! The rooms were perfsctly clean, the staff from ythe receptionist, to the cleaning lady, to the waitor, was so helpful and kind! Everything was above our expectations! Will come back!!
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Check in was efficient and there is a gated, secure parking at the back of the hotel. Bit of a walk with luggage from the parking area, if you don't take it out in front of the hotel on arrival.Room is comfortable, air conditioning works great, close enough to downtown that one could walk or take transit. As Hotel was not real busy, they reduced parking costs by 50%.Good shower pressure but watch when you step out of bathtub/shower as it is a large drop.Lots of dining choices nearby. Separate breakfast area & bar for guests.Quiet location.Would recommend
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This boutique Hotel was great for the location nearby the Metro into central Milan, rooms were clean and fairly priced and spacious. Included breakfast and parking access was a plus for our short visit. Elevators for luggage transfer was small, but worked. I found the overall price point and accommodations to work well for our trip.
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: As advertised, small but comfortable. Location is steps to the metro, very convenient but in a quiet area. Breakfast was great (lots of options) and the staff pleasant and informative. We would stay there again and not hesitate to recommend it to anyone.
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Lovely hotel where you can get with view to a park .Good breakfast.The location was excellent , really close to a subway station where the red line of the subway passes (this is one of the main lines)There are also restaurants nearby .
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stay in this hotel quite frequently. When we were living in Milan we recommended the hotel to our visiting friends. I have since left Milan and now use it as my preferred hotel for business. It works equally well for business or holiday. Rooms are very quiet. Hotel has a small boutique with beautiful serene gardens - a pleasant alternative to the typical hotel in Milan. The hotel is very close to a great range of shops (Corso Vercelli, Corso Magenta etc). It also has a great food market a few hundred metres away. Most importantly - its is just a 100m walk to the metro. 5 minutes on the metro to the Duomo.
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: When you do not want to be entered to the room for cleaning, normally you hung the tag of Do Not Disturb on the room door. But it does not work in this hotel. The cleaning person had entered to our room where there are some valuable things in the room. Although there was no missing thing, it was not comfortable and was unacceptable. We have asked the front person but they said that: if you do not need room cleaning you need to tell the front person specifically everyday! The regular rule is not working in this hotel, please be careful when you use this hotel.
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is lovely and clean and a short walk from the MICO congress centre. It has lovely gardens and a nice breakfast. What I could not believe is the price for 2 nights was over 700 euros!!! The room was comfortable and close to the metro station to the centre
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed one night in this hotel as everything else in the area was booked. Although the hotel was clean and modern, the rooms were a bit small for the price. The hotel is in genaral a bit loud - you can hear every movement, unlocking of doors, etc.
hotelName:
10    Hotel Tiziano - Gruppo Mini Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It is always a pleasure to come to yourr hotel , staff is always nice & polite !Special thanks to the barman (sorry do not remember his name , he was from Pakistan?)Thank you very much & see you again
hotelName:
11    Best Western Plus Hotel Galles
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My group stayed here in September and loved the hotel. Breakfast offered a range of choices. The pool and gym were a bonus, as were the rooftop terraces. Could not get a better position for exploring MIlan.
hotelName:
11    Best Western Plus Hotel Galles
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is run down and the pollution in Milan is a class 1 carcinogen as set by World Health Organization standards. My chest became tight after one night at this hotel. The rooms are also very outdated and filthy (eg stains on every decorative pillow, dust and hair everywhere).To make matters worse, the hotel check-our refused to provide a receipt and was attempting to NOT honor my Beat Western travel cards. They tried to say that I needed to tell them about the cards at check-in, which I did. They took my cards and swiped them and then at the end said they couldn’t give me a receipt at this time and would email me. Because we had to catch a train, we acquiesced and left. Three days later and I still have not received a receipt.
hotelName:
11    Best Western Plus Hotel Galles
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good location. Walls paper thin could hear next rooms conversation. Plus traffic noise from street. Rooms average size. Small bathroom with bug step out of bath not good for mobility impaired people. Pillows and bed good night sleep. Barman very helpful.
hotelName:
11    Best Western Plus Hotel Galles
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good location, comfortable room and efficient check in/out process. Our room was quiet as it overlooked the central courtyard. Lovely bar area.I did object to paying a EUR10/night "tourist tax" though!
hotelName:
11    Best Western Plus Hotel Galles
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Everything was great about this place. Distance to City center was only concern for visiting Milan for the first time. Front desk service was excellent and accommodating. Breakfast was best we had at any other hotel on our trip.
hotelName:
11    Best Western Plus Hotel Galles
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel was convenient to transportation options, and also convenient to shopping, dining and tourist attractions. We were traveling from Rome to Paris via train, and a 2 day stop in Milan was perfect for us to recharge our batteries for the second leg of our trip.
hotelName:
11    Best Western Plus Hotel Galles
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good hotel ,and it is very good place in the city ,near to metro. Clear rooms. The hotel is for 15 minutes walking from central station.I am happy that we was in this hotel .if we will go to Milano ,then we will to be in this hotel again
hotelName:
11    Best Western Plus Hotel Galles
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Room was comfortable and quite with minimal traffic noise. Staff very friendly and the buffet breakfast up on the rooftop was scrumptious. May have been helpful to know that you can get an early light breakfast in the lobby if you have an early tour as the buffet only opens at 7am. Would definitely stay there again.
hotelName:
11    Best Western Plus Hotel Galles
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel was great. Room was clean and perfect. Good restaurants nearby. A great location. Helpful staff. A delight. The local area was fu lol of bars restaurants and shops. It was on the main train line. You could get to the cathedral in ten minutes.
hotelName:
11    Best Western Plus Hotel Galles
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed in a triple room with my cousins which was spacious. The breakfast was amazing and catered for my cousin's dietary needs. Lovely pool and sauna to relax in, would definitely stay in this hotel again.
hotelName:
11    Best Western Plus Hotel Galles
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location, ideally placed for Metro right outside. Just a few stops from Duomo and site seeing. Staff very pleasant and helpful. Room very clean and comfortable . Free breakfast was given to take with us on our very early departure
hotelName:
11    Best Western Plus Hotel Galles
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellent location, metro just a few steps from main entrance, with excellent connection to airport and city centre. Very clean hotel, excellent check in and check out services, staff very cordial and ready to help. Restaurant with city view offers a vast choice of breakfast. Nice Spa facilities and fitness centre. I visit very often and highly recommend.
hotelName:
11    Best Western Plus Hotel Galles
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: As we arrived by train, the hotel was in a perfect location being only a 15 minute walk from Milano Centrale. It was also perfectly situated if you wanted to do some shopping as it is right on the Corso Buenos Aires. Walking to the centre was easy as well, with it being only a 25 minute walk to the Duomo and main attractions of Milan. The hotel itself was nice - the room had everything we needed for a short 2 night stay, and despite being on the first floor facing onto the main square, it was still very quiet! There was a wide spread of items for breakfast in the morning, which was perfect for gearing up for a full day exploring Milan.
