review_body: Good location quite close to the Centrale station, and well-served by the Metro and bus. Little supermarket close by. My room was very big - two large beds with a lounge-type area containing a settee and a good working table. Bathroom was quite large as well. Good value - no hesitation in recommending it.
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My husband and I stayed here for 2 nights at the end of a trip to France and Italy. I booked last minute whilst away via a secret deal so got a very good price. I'm not sure if I would have paid the full asking price.. The location is really convenient for central station but there is not a great deal by the hotel. This was no problem for us as we were all over the city on the metro anyway. The hotel itself has a nice outdoor seating area, staff were helpful and breakfast was great. The room was massive and well equipped but was a little scruffy around the edges if you looked closely enough (marks on walls, broken rail in the shower etc). That said the decor was great and the room was very clean. Our room safe wouldn't lock upon arrival but that was sorted quickly and we the cleaners arrived on at least two occasions to ask if we wanted anything. Wifi is fine and I managed to stream Netflix on my tabket without issue. On balance I would stay here again and would also book in other hotels in this chain.
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The UNAHOTELS Century Milano is a nice hotel near the centre of Milan. The hotel itself was well maintained and looked very new. The breakfast was great with lots of variety of food. The room was large with a nice bed with enough closet room etc. Much more roomy than the average big city hotel in Europe. The bathroom was very nice with lots of space. Would definitely stay again if we travel to Milan again.
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: 5min away from the Centrale station by walk, 13mins to Duomo by subway, the hotel has an easy access to anywhere around the region.The staff at the front counter were enormously professional and was welcoming.The room was spacious and cozy as well I was wondering maybe I made the last min (a day before) they seemed to miss some of amenities like comb, only one shampoo + body bath, no complimentary water , no iron, no kettle, no tea coffee, no slippers Even the kettle has 10euro charge Felt it was bit of insufficient on providing amenities But overall it was cozy and nice hotel!
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Location is good, close to Centrale FS and not far from Garibaldi FS and a short Metro ride from the city centre. We had some problems locating the hotel, which is a large former office block behind the Hyatt. This also defines its somewhat corporate nature. However rooms were a good size, clean and without unnecessary frills. Service was polite and we were offered another room immediately when we reported a small fault with a light switch, which cause a light on a dimmer switch to come on unexpectedly. We declined, it was not serious enough for us to pack and unpack again. However, although it was a Sunday, it did surprise me no technician was available to look at this. Faults and failures don’t respect working hours. We booked through a web booking site, offering a deal. When we tried to book an additional night, we were quoted a much higher rate. One I thought was too much. But this is Milan, there’s no shortage of business visitors willing to pay. Excellent stay, do not regret booking this.
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We were pleasantly surprised at the size of our room as well as the bathroom. It was very clean and comfortable. The buffet breakfast is wonderful. There is something for everyone. We were walking distance to the train station as well as many restaurants and historic sites. Would definitely stay at this hotel again. Very good value all around. Great for families too. And great A/C!
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We booked a junior suite and got upgraded to executive junior suite upon check in. The room was huge and comfortable, walking distance from the Centrale station however the pin on the Google map was not accurate. We had to look out for 'UNA Hotel' sign and follow the sign instead. Breakfast was nice and simple with really good croissant. One thing to mention was the room service attitude. We asked for extra pillows on the first night, a guy delivered them to us with a dull face and even though I was polite and said 'Thank you', he never respond at all. On the third night, we requested for another set of towels because there was only one bath towel for the two of us after our room was cleaned in the afternoon. The same guy came and not say a word again. He could at least put on a smile? :) Overall a great hotel to stay in Milan!
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice,, clean,, convenient hotel.. the price was very good for my vacation budget too.. the location was close to the trains station..I totally recommend it and i will definitely stay at the same hotel in my next visit to Milan
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: we checked in late last night after a long trip and we were horrified by the condition of the hotel. Upon check in we discovered that the rooms are nothing like as advertised, extremely dirty and very unhygienic . As we spend more time, the conditions became more and more clear and we could not even sleep, and checked out at 6 am. The room walls all have stains of dirt, the floor is extremely dirty and old. The AC control until , all light switched , etc has a strange stink that we could not even touch. The condition in bathroom is worst, the bathroom is full of mold, the shower head is moldy and broken, the towels in the room all had stains to it and after several requests, the hotel replaced one. The conditions were unlivable for us and ended up cancelling our 2 nights stay for both rooms and stayed at nearby hotel.
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Location 5- 300 meter from Milan central station yet quiet, all major destinations easily accessible. Cleanliness 5. Service 5.Breakfast excellent, Cafe open in evening to late night, had excellent dinner twice, reasonable prices. Room 5, comfortable, spacious, toiletries are provided. No kettle in the room. However, cafe is open till late. Only hitch was the restrictions on AC put up by city municipal council. Will stay again if we go to Milan.
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Well appointed hotel and room in this city hotel. The room I had was a junior suite and very comfortable and clean. The breakfast was a little limited and buffet style only. Checkout was slow but the staff were friendly.
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Had Two nights stay here in a junior suites. 5 mins away from Milan Central Railway station. Area around feels safe even at night.Room was big enough but lacking basic amenities- No water boiler, only 3 pillows available and all were flat and lacks some basic toiletries. Overall a pleasant stay.4 stars for clean modern room, good location, check in was ok, could do a water boiler and better pillows.
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a wonderful stay here for two nights, despite the initial bad impression with a disinterested man who checked us in However the rest of the staff were extremely helpful and friendly. One man at the front desk helped us book a restaurant on our first night, and the bar staff were wonderful, especially the young Mr Ricciardo who makes a wonderful Sbagliato cocktail The room and bathroom was clean and enormous! And the included breakfast was delicious.The hotel was a short walk to the Central station so it was easy to walk in to catch the Metro to the Duomo and to our train out to the airport on our last day.Would stay here again
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I love the room at this hotel! Super spacious, modern and clean. I love how there’s a living room/sitting area in the room and just made it feel like we were in an apartment. The bathroom was large, but to get toiletries you need to call the front desk if you need anything. The location itself is not bad….It was about a 15-minute walk from Milano central. The hotel is pretty far from the main attractions in Milan to walk so we used the trains and taxi to simply get around. Overall I liked this hotel because of the size and cleanliness of the room.
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I enjoyed our stay. The bed and bathroom were clean and comfortable. No complaints. Staff were friendly. Breakfast area was clean and spacious. And it is conveniently across from the train station Incase you’re looking to travel.
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very large clean room, good heating, good bathroom ... free breakfast and wifi. Very close to the central train station - walking distance. Service is friendly. Building a bit hidden and can be difficult to find at first.
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: An average hotel that does not manage to deliver value for money. Most importantly personnel although willing to service client’s needs totally lucks smile and friendliness. Way out from the concept of hospitality.
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I was offended as a non religious person by the hotel. Newspaper “selection” in breakfast room consisting only of the daily paper published by the italian catholic church. Complained on twitter, they replied after 2 days that they would add more titles. Still quite appalling oversight for an international business hotel.
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Rooms are big, beds very comfortable. Staff is friendly. If you arrive by car, they have a garage. But the navigation will have some problems finding the place.Breakfast is good, I missed fresh fruit. Overall good hotel, which does not look very attractive from outside, but inside is well maintained.
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel is close to the station so it is very good if you are doing day trips. Stayed as a family of 4. Wifi was good. The sofa bed had scruff marks and was a little uncomfortable. Breakfast was nice. Staff should smile more and be engaged with guests in welcoming them to the hotel. Apart from that, it was a nice stay.
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A fab location for the train station. Breakfast was vast and the rooms are big and comfortable. Just a note that hotel isn’t located on the main road, just off it (just in case you can’t find it). Would stay again
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel was excellently positioned to get around, didnt realise how big Milan was, just a short walk to the train station and underground. Check in took a little too long, but we got in, the world cup was on - so that helped, staff were quite friendly, especially the chap behind the bar, who liked Juventus, talked very good english and football being a good topic , was a good help. Milan itself would recommend the aperol bar overlooking the Doumo, would not recommend the san siro stadium tour, as its complete rubbish, stadium is good, but the tour is very poor value for money.take extra care on the underground as we got stung for 34 euros for not getting a second ticket which cost 2 euros to get to the idays festival if you use the underground and travel outside the area, it was our own fault but there were about 20 guards waiting with their credit card machines for this, as they knew what was going to happen. Festival itself was great, but a long walk from the station when we got out, so when we got back to the hotel, made the most of the bed which was very comfy and the shower which was quite powerful to ease the muscles used...Breakfast was continental and very good.
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We booked this hotel because we wanted be near train and reviews. Not lived up to. #1 Issue...we napped upon check in after an overnight flight...so tired. The overhead room light...would come on every 30 min or hour and illuminate the rooms.So darkness and then full light. We told them , they sent a tech....then we went out.Upon sleeping that night we had the room light coming on its own...every hour or more.we never got up for our included breakfast as we had no sleep,Next am checked out...a curt greeting. A curt apology. We payed our bill and left. You can see how many poor reviews ive given on tripadvisor since 2006. Barely any.Im sure there's better hotels for the money spent here in Milan. Would never recommend this hotel. Also they had one small bar soap and one small shampoo...u could order more to room.two flat pillows on giant bed..u could order more.Good things...the room was large. We had a corner view with two windows.
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Really happy with the quality of room and professionalism of staff at the UNA Hotel Century. The room was wonderful - spacious, very well appointed and quality furnishings. The bed was also very comfortable. The breakfasts were extremely good and the hotel added the extra benefit if you had an early excursion they would arrange a breakfast box for you. Overall great stay and a enjoyable experience / memory to as part of our wonderful 4 weeks in Italy
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I thought the room location was great. Other than that, everything was fine. The room was large, modern and quiet. But nothing else really stood out about it. I think it could be good hotel for family, but not the best for couples.
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel’s room was very big, comfortable and modern also the shower. There are not enough shower gel and shampoo in the bathroom though. The hotel’s entrance is a bit difficult to find but very close to station. The breakfast was good, the only thing I didn’t like was the coffee.
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel entrance is not easy to find. The taxi needs to call reception to open the gate. The lobby is small but nice. My room on the 14th floor was large, the bed was very good and the batchroom very spacious. Good working facilities. The wifi was very was very bad. The connection kept disconnecting. Very bad for a business hotel.
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We booked for convenience near train as we were only staying one night and were very impressed. Room was very large with table and two comfy chairs plus a desk. Bathroom was huge, loved the showers and the decor, all fresh and new. Buffet breakfast was very good, plenty to choose from. Staff friendly, does not have tea/coffee in your room but we requested it and they brought up all that we needed. Great value!
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel has comfortable beds, big room and modern facilities.The room was big enough to accommodate family with kids.Location - it is close enough to city centre but not walkable if you have small kids. We tried to walk to the city centre to explore the area and took us about an hour. I would recommend to take taxi or you can take the tram but we never got to learn how to because we were only there for 4 days.The room - comfortable, spacious, comfy beds and pillows.Cleanliness - the room was clean and they truly cleaned every day.Customer service - good customer service, friendly and professional.Overall an enjoyable stay and would recommend this hotel especially to family with kids.
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location about 500 mtrs from Milan Centrale station. Very spacious rooms with choice of pillows! The staff was very friendly and helpful. Due to flight timing, needed to check out late. The Manager gave a discount! Breakfast was good. No choice of cooked eggs though.
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed a week and definitely had a great time.The room is really big and comfortable.the bathroom is big too,modern and spotless/the breakfast was excellent and after 2 mornings the waiter already knew before we even asked that we wanted 2 cappuccinos!a shame that we don't know his name!We had the same good experience with the staff at the front desk.The location is five minutes walk from the central station, which is an ideal location.I recommend the hotel.
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is really great. Beautiful rooms, convenient location, very friendly staff and overall just a great experience. Stayed 2 nights and will definitely stay here again. Thanks UNA hotel! 5 stars, no question.
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very convenient location. Just 5 minutes walk from central station (metro, train, bus). We were very happy to have found this hotel. The breakfast was excellent with a great variety of food. The rooms are big and very clean! Friendly staff too!
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is located near the central railway station. A few kilometers to the center with things to see and great restaurants, but the metro is very handy and accessible from here!The hotel perhaps lacks a bit in character, but the concept is functional, staff is very helpful and rooms are clean and modern. And the hotel a parking garage with valet service. So overall a good stay.
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice hotel,Conveniently located.Prefer the rooms on upper floors to have a little bit of city view ( not that romantic though, just an industrial district view). Breakfast OK but you have to wait as the breakfast room is small. The waiter is nice though, he is accomodating so you dont get nervous. Overall a good exlerience
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Don't get me wrong on the overall rating, it is a good modern business hotel. It has got a nice location, around 5-10mins walking from the Milan central station. The rooms are relatively large as compared to other hotels in the same price point. The breakfast is a good spread.Negatives-1.) They charge a Criminally prohibitive 10 EUR on every in-room dining. When most dishes are 12-15 Euros, its like charging 80% over the food. The hotel doesn't have a 24hr restaurant where you can go and have food and the main restaurant closes at 2.30PM. If you checkin by 3pm and want to have a soup/salad, God help you.2.) The bathroom just has the shampoo and a bar of soap. Along kept a note that if you need conditioner or dental kit then pls call reception. (not at this price point hotel).3.) The room doesnt have slippers or bath-robe, you have to call the reception again.4.) Its a business hotel and they dont have Iron-board in room OR even on request from room service. You have to use Laundry service for basic ironing.It is because of these reasons that I have rated it poor, considering its price point and the 10Euro charge is obscene.The hotel staff is courteous. The breakfast area is efficient.
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is located 5 min walk from Milano Centrale train station. Very convenient, if traveling by train throughout Italy. Despite many comments, that it is tricky to find the hotel, we found it very easily. In fact, there are a least three indicators around the business center. So, it is very straight forward to find the entrance. The metro station is also located 5 min walk away, near Milano Centrale. It is just four metro stops to Duomo by yellow line and five stops to the Castle by green line. There are lots of places to eat in via Vittor Pisani. We enjoyed City Life Cafe a lot. The breakfast is very tasty, with great variety of choices. Good espresso from coffee machine. The room was huge for European standards. Very clean, modern and comfortable. Huge windows to enjoy the city lights after darkness, with proper thick curtains to isolate any excessive light. The hotel offers the selection of pillows, but subject to availability. High quality linen and towels. Great soundproofing. Pleasant and helpful personnel. Check-in and check-out process was smooth. Overall, a nice big chain hotel. Would definitely stay here another time.
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Just back from 8 nights in the Una Century Hotel. Really enjoyed it. Room was huge and very comfortable. No problems with WIFI. We had a junior suite. Bathroom was fabulous, overall standard of cleanliness really excellent. The location is fantastic, only a few minutes walk from Milano Centrale Train Station and Metro. Staff in the hotel are excellent, very friendly and extremely helpful. We ate in the restaurant a couple of nights and food was lovely. Bar and restaurant staff were great. Only issue for us was breakfast, hot food wasn’t to our taste but the continental was fine. We were sorry to leave and we are planning on returning to Milan and will definitely stay here again.
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Pros: Friendly staff. The hotel is modern with spacious rooms. Comfortable beds. The breakfast was good and had a lot of different choices. Quiet neighborhood. You can leave your luggage at the reception if you have a late flight/train depature. Close to the Milano Centrale train station (=300m).Cons/Improvement suggestions: Soundproofing could be better. (Now you can easily here your neighbours going to the bathroom or people talking in the corridor.)
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here for a couple night last year while I was in Milan , room was clean and bright , also the biggest I had in Milan. Close to train station and major attractions, highly recommended. Walking distance to train station and a lot of amenities . Would stay again
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A good place to stay to visit Milano. A quick walk from Milano central station. Nice and large rooms with a astounishing wiew when you are in the top floors. Breakfasts are good with a great choice of food and real italian coffee.
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location is good as long as you know how to find the entrance of the hotel. Pro: Nice hotel near Centrale Station Big bedroom, comfortable bed. Quite at nightBreakfast is good, as long as you don’t run into rush hourCon: Wifi not so goodLocated behind the gate of a business complex, you better ask around and look for the sign.
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stay here frequently and have done for many years. They refurbished a couple of years ago. The rooms are unusually big, immaculately clean, large showers, comfy beds, very quiet. This isn’t a luxury, five star style hotel. But if you are looking for somewhere clean, spacious, central and reasonably priced then this place ticks all boxes. I do wish that they had a gym and a better restaurant. The staff are mostly lovely also.
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good staff, good location and nice hotel :) the reception are very nice :) The hotel is very clean and modern. Plus, the hotel is really nearby the central station. I will definitely come back to this hotel.
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Value for money, very good location near the Central station of Milan .All the points of interest is in walking distanceVery good service at the reception desk the breakfast was awesome and the rooms very clean and comfortable as well.I recommended it for a short stay in the city of Milan
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is great and in very good location close to Milan central train station and to metro few minutes walk. The rooms are very big since the hotel have only suites. The bathroom is very nice and with plenty of space. The rooms are very clean and the twin bed is really really big and comfortable. The breakfast is great with huge variety of choices. The only negative of the hotel is that the internet is really slow.
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great hotel. Beautiful rooms. Friendly staff. Well located next to the central station. However, Ia warning; the WiFi service is terrible. This is very frustrating for a foreign traveler trying not to burn cellular data. This is surprising for a hotel this nice.
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My friend and I were there in march 2017. hotel is very clean with great room.nice bathroom.the hotel is in good location near rail way station. the breakfast was very good.the staff are helpful and friendly. I recommend this hotel.
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Had a very comfy stay in this conveniently-located hotel, a 5 minute walk from Milan central station and about a 15-20 minute walk from the city centre. We were given top floor-rooms with stunning views over the city. The rooms were very clean and spacious with large double beds on one side of the room and the living room / dining room areas on the other side. The beds were very comfortable to sleep on, being firm enough to support your back. There was a flat-screen TV facing the dining table and tea and coffee-making facilities. There was also a mini-bar, useful for storing cold snacks. The ensuite was large and it had a rainfall shower and a heated towel rail; the water pressure for the shower head was very strong. The buffet breakfast was one of the best I’ve ever had. It had a wide range of items and good choice, including even fried rice and biscuits, along with traditional continental fare and cooked items like those you would find in an English breakfast. There was a good selection of hot and cold drinks too. The reception and particularly the housekeeping personnel were very friendly. They can provide a map of Milan if you need one. Overall, a very pleasant, luxurious and memorable stay. This hotel offers a wonderful base for exploring Milan.
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We have from time to time done 1 day transit in Milan so looking for a hotel close to the train station/transport options to the airport is important to us. We didn't need anything fancy but we also wanted a nice modern hotel. We felt UNA Hotel Century delivered exactly what we needed.It's very close to the central train station and easy to find. The building is a bit tucked away next to other corporate/office/hotel buildings but the signage is relatively clear. & it felt safe. It's a business trip clientele oriented hotel but we saw families checking in as well.We had booked directly with the hotel website and Checkin was no fuss.Our room was on the 2nd floor (or 3rd floor for non-Europeans) and was huuge. It even had a treadmill in the room - which was a first for us -And we still had plenty of room to open 3 luggage bags. Very clean - simple modern furniture. We paid about €100/night with breakfast. Breakfast is from 7am and had good selection. if you had to leave before 7, just let the front desk know and they will prepare a mini breakfast bag for you.Overall we were very pleased with the hotel and look forward to return on our next Milan stopover trip!!
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I was pleasantly surprised by the spacious room with sitting corner, large windows, spacious bathroom in contemporary style. Only stayed for 1 night on business trip at walking distance from Porta Garibaldi/ shopping street/Eataly etc. Breakfast buffet had a wide variety and good quality. Very friendly staff. Only point for improvement: long waiting line to check out in the morning as you have to pay the city tax. Any option to have self check out? or give the option to pay this tax at time of check in. That would make the check out much more efficient.
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good team on reception and bar !Really friendly guys.The service was perfect ! Good snacks at bar and the breakfast was really well served! I have nothing bad to say ! At all what I most liked was how friendly the reception and the guys at bar were with us.I’ll be back for sure !
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: very nice hotel, people rally friendly and the accomodation is very comfortableclose to milano centrale train station is a good place to stay although 3 stops away from the tourist areathe breakfast is good
hotelName:
26    UNAHOTELS Century Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Outlet next to my bed was busted. One of the bathroom stalls had a broken lock. Otherwise, wonderful staff and had great fun at the hostel bar! Breakfast served is usually a panini bar, sometimes with the option of some fruit.
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Queen hostel in Milano is a very price worthy hostel located in a nice area of Milano. The staff were super friendly and helpful and the premise was very nice and clean. Breakfast was nice and included. Stay here if you're into meeting new people
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed here for one night and it was fantastic. Lovely atmosphere, very clean rooms, and most importantly the staff were so so friendly , helpful and welcoming. I would definitely return if I ever visit Milan again
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is the Hostel you want it to be! If you want a party hostel that just makes it easy to get to know new people, this is it! If you want to be more on you own and do your own thing, this is it!The staff is just 5*, it's just the best thing about this great Hostel! Everyone is super nice and will make you feel completly welcoming and at home since the begining! The location is good too. Only 20min on foot from the Duomo. It has a supermarket ~4min on foot. And overall the surrounding area is very friendly with a lot of nice restaurants. Seems to be a nice neighbourhood.The hostel itself has various relaxing areas, ones more suitable to eat, others to read, others to chat or do whatever you want. It has a lot of games as well, including soccer table and snooker.The breakfast is ok according to the price you pay (also acoording with hostel and overall prices in the city). Toasts, ham and cheese, sweets, biscoits, juice, coffee and tea.Stayed here for 4 nights in a dorm with 11 beds (which could be risky) and had a great experience. Definitely recommend it!
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The staff was very kind and helpful. The rooms and the bathroom were clean. The location of the hostel is very good as well as it is very close to the city centre. In the evening there were always any acitivities you could do with other travellers in the hostel, allover a very fun stay!
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: If you like shots, music, dancing, beer pong, karaoke and a friendly environment, this is the best hostel ever. The breakfast in the morning was great and the staff were all super nice. Eventhough there was music blasting downstairs at 10pm, in the rooms, you couldn't hear anything. There's a "no noise" rule in the dorms that everyone respected, even in a 12 beds bedroom which I really appreciated because I slept well. I highly recommend this hostel for people who like to make friends!
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Rooms are large and comfy. Useful kitchen, nice bar and good atmosphere even if the reception staff is a bit « cold ». Not that close from the city center but easily reachable by tramways or metro. Have fun !
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It was my first hostel experience and it was amazing. The staffs were very very welcoming and caring. They had a party place to make friends and hangout inside the hostel only. The hosstel was clean and safe. They also had kitchen where you can cook your own food or you can order as well. They had a welcome free drink (wine) as soon as you reach. I made good friends in the hostel. If I am visiting Milan again, its definitely the Queen hostel.
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is is the best hostel I ever been. The place is very clean, the breakfast is excelent (what a hostel can provide) and the staff... the staff are amazing!!Thank you guys! Next time in Milano I definily will stay there.
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I've stayed in a ton of hostels, and this may have been one of the best I experienced! When I arrived, they gave me a free drink and were super friendly. It was a very social hostel, so its really easy to make friends. Also, very clean! would stay here again in a heartbeat
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: One of the best hostel I've ever been to : great location, cheap, clean, nice staff and nice people ! We had free drink at our check-in and free breakfast in the morning... Way better than what we expected :)
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It was an amazing time! I saw the staff speaking MANY lenguages, from the italian to japanese. Those guys know how to make you fell at home. Bar is incredable and when you arrive they’ll welcome you with a big smile, kindness and a beautiful italian cold beer. I’d recomend a milion times! Tks guys for the hospitality!
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: What I loved the most was the people working there, they were always there to help me, to give me information about what to do in Milan or just for a chit chat, they were so reachable. Breakfast also was much beyond expectations as I was expecting a typical 'Italian Breakfast' which is just a coffee and cookies. They offered ham, cheese, fruit, juice, hot drinks, cookies and so on and it's included! Free towel rental was a big con as well, as I always hate to bring a wet towel around with me while travelling. At night they do happy hour, drinks were much cheaper and people were hanging around, singing, chatting, playing games,,, even as a solo traveller it was so fun and the people working there make it easy to connect with other guests. I wish I could stay longer! :) Definitely recommend if you are going to Milan
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It's annoying that you can't pay with a credit card (under a certain amount spent). They also refused to let me and my friend pay separately both times, meaning we had to figure out ways to get cash to each other and made our lives more complicated. After they messed up a payment for us, they said they couldn't undo it, so we had to deal with the repercussions of their error.
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: First the staff from reception (Pedro & Mauro) 5***** the best host! Friendly, helpful, very good attitude, the size of the rooms have space enough, super clean, the woman who was cleaning was there every day, the bathrooms as well clean, I could say the breakfast was quite basic but maybe European kinda breakfast (bread, coffee, milk, a bit of fruits, cheese and ham), location was also good.. near the attractions.. thank you guys for make my stay that pleasant, whenever i go back to Milan I would stay there!
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The rooms were clean and had AC, the social areas were lovely and breakfast was solid with ham and toast and OJ and hot Chocolate . Only con was the showers, hot water was basically nonexistent. There was construction going on when I arrived so the closest tram stops didn't operate which was a pain.
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very nice hostel. Great atmosphere and service. Generally I stay in four star hotels, but if you go on hostel it surely one of the best in Milan. Very nice atmosphere. Also one of the reception guys is very nice(hot).
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I booked at the last minute this hostel, but was good. The guys in the hostel are very friendly, ready to help you with any questions you have; the price was quite affordable and during the breakfast there is a great variety of food you can pick up. The room was maintained tidy and neat all the time. In general I liked it
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I have a great time in this hostel, everybody was friendly and love the place.Good service and clean hostel. The people working in there were helpful with the information about visiting places in Barcelona.
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I had so much fun at this Hostel, we had drinking games during the night, amazing staff and super clean place, I recommend this place 100% the dorms are big, the kitchen has everything that you could need and the bar has really good prices also
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hostel has nice atmosphere. However, i found the prices a bit steep. The bar/reception is very good and helpful. The AC was not working the first day i arrived but was working thereafter. There were some flies in the common areas and more strict cleaning is required in that part.
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Gustavo and the others next day at the breakfast were really friendly.In the room was extremly cold for us all because of the air conditioning. If you arrive and want to check in late, it is very loud because of the party behind the reception, bathroom not really clean and toilet was broken, breakfast poor. Too expensive for that what you get there. For one night it was ok but I would not go back.
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice place to visit Milan with a group or solo. The rooms are basicly furnished but you spent most of the time either in chillout area or in the city. Environment is cool, feels like home. The staff is friendly,anything you need they will try to solve.location is near the center and tram station(you can buy tickets at the reception). They offer you bike rental. The breakfast is OK, nothing special, could have been better. We were confused with glass refunds - on some days the staff was confused what to do.
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We were staying at Queen Hostel in Milan for 2 days. The Hostel is located in the centre of the beautiful Milan. At the Hostel they have a lovely staff! You have a warm welcome with a drink on the house and they take their time for you too sort everything out for your stay. The rooms have an AC, which was very nice because it was 32+ degrees Celcius outside! They have also great relaxing areas and a great bar. You can have a bite at the Hostel or you can go just around the corner for some great Pizza. The breakfast was pretty good and is included in the price!
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: During my stay at this hostel I had a really nice time, the lobby it’s awesome to meet people and have fun without going out, and the drinking games are really nice. The bathroom was really clean and you have a power outlet next to the bed.
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: absolutely top class hostel. Very friendly staff, very clean place, and a very social environment with bar crawls, club crawls, and city tours where you can meet lots of nice people.Rooms are clean with good air con.
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Would stay here again. Great café and local/hometown vibe restaurant right around the corner. Had the room to myself by chance. Place was clean. Good communal hangout spots. Good value for what I paid.
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I spent 2 night in Queen Hostel during a solo trip in Italy. The common area is clean and contains everything (bar, pool table, ...) to chill and meet people. There is a kitchen you can use to cook and for the laziest ones, you can order food at the bar.The dormitory and bathroom were okay, the staff is very nice and eager to answer your questions about Milano.I particularly liked the board at the entrance with the basic info about Milano and some Italian vocabulary. Very useful ;-)
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed in hostel for only 1 night as a stopover and was pleasantly surprised as to how peaceful the dorms were and had a full nights' rest! Clean beds, showers were okay and good breakfast (free so can't complain)!
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It was really amazing. I arrived alone and the people at the reception were very nice and friendly and very helpful. I don’t speak Italien but had to book a ticket for a concert on an Italien website. Pedro (I think) from the reception was kind enough to help me and he went out of his way to do that. Just incredibly nice and amazing people. The welcome drink was also very nice The room itself was very clean and had a comfortable bed. Overall an amazing experience and I can only recommend Queen Hostel to anyone
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed with my friend in a dorm for four nights. Had a blast. The staff was helpfull and very kind! The atmosphere was amazing, it’s a good place for social people. The breakfast was allright, so was the cleanliness. Had a lovely stay.
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Best hostel in Milan. Best vibe. staff couldn’t be better. Gustavo and Pedro are the simply great! The staff is friendly, the rooms are very clean and everything about their infrastructure is considering their clientele’s needs. Couldn’t have a better experience in Milan. Party’s there are awesome, sometimes you just don’t wanna leave the however as it is so close to the main touristic attractions of Milan you end up going. Is close to the subway, supermarkets and a a lot of Italian bakeries and good restaurants of basically every kind of cuisine you can find. Also in the hostel they offer very good and comfort food and their drinks are amazing, good tap beer always freezing cold as it a proper pint has to be served. I couldn’t have a better experience with a hostel in Milan, always come back when I’m in the city.
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: its a good place, the bar and the rooms are so good.The gays of reception was very friendly.the hostel has bar, laundry, big bathrooms and differents activities for you, like karaoke, tours....a good place
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It was my first experience at a hostel. I saw the good reviews and I booked it. I picked 4 persons girls room was so spacious. There's a game area and a bar area and a lounge area nice the kitchen was also very well kept. I was surprised it was very spacious. Breakfast included was a great perk too. Free snacks with a drink was great too. Met new friends there as well. It was nice and all areas were clean. The showers didn't have pressure so the shower drizzled took longer than expected but managed.
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: the hostel was fun and it is in a great erea for discovering the culture of Milano. in the evening thre was Always someting to do and it was a great place to relax and to take drink at the bar after a long day of site seeing. the rooms where basic but good and they where clean. the personel wad super helpfull and friendly
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great vibe for the entire place. Confortable and safe room, great staff, nice food and a very complete kitchen. Great walking tour from the reception desk, and I ended up taking a cooking class right in the hostel. The location is also pretty good. I would totally recommend it.
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hostel was pretty good and has good parties and the ones that were there where nice and happy people. I really enjoyed my stay. The check in and check out were fast and whithout problems at all. Thanks for making my time at milan even better.
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice clean hostel. People were great, stay was great. Even had a small secure car park which was perfect! Only stayed for one night as I was doing a round trip. This hostel is a short walk away from the cathedral and city centre. Highly recommend
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: the hostel is very very nice, well located, walking distance from the duomo. The facilities are very clean, they provide free popcorn every night which is great. The staff was amaizing and always willing to help with everything
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hostel was very Neat and clean and also very comfortable. The staff was very Hospitable and friendly and they Provided every required information. Hostel is located in a prime area within walking distance from public transport stations
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel staff were friendly and the atmosphere was great.I came looking for a 2-4 person room since I was traveling solo and doesn't want to feel alone.The hotel staff was able to switch things around to accommodate me.Best part was I called in to book the room at 11pm of the night I were to spend the night (got caught up on touristy stuff during the day) and they were able to respond and provide me accommodation right away.
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hostel was a breath of fresh air on my backpacking trip. I’d stayed at some dire hostels in this time. Although it was very basic it was extremely clean and there were brilliant amenities and breakfast. Would definitely recommend this place. I must also note that I was in a 3 bed mixed room bunk but I still had a lot of space. Safe place for solo female traveller
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed in a 16 bed-room. The room was spacious. The staff was helpful to any problems. I particularly liked the location. It made me feel safe at all times and close to navigli and downtown, I'd recommend staying here.
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nearby all train stations and walking distance to attractions, Restroom is a bit far from room, but room is spacious. Staff is very nice, no issues storing luggage before and after checkout. I would recommend
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I was in Italy for a meeting. I tried the hotels and the downtown hostel but didn't find anything appealing. The Queen provided a location in the old part of town with a walking map of the best streets. I liked the breakfast because I could sit outside and listen to the local matins bells.
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hostel is fantastic! Great conditions, amazing breakfast and very good location The staff is very kind and always ready to help you and to give you the best tips about Milan, and one great thing is that I'm pretty sure that you'll find someone who speaks your language! What sometimes can be very helpful...Couldn't choose any better place to spend my Mother/Daughter trip ♥️
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Queen Hostel is a great place to stay in Milan. Clean rooms, nice styling and very friendly staff! We were here with a group of 16 girls and everything we asked for was arranged. Plus is the breakfast which is included and they many nice activities to do (poolgame, boardgames, table soccer etc)
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I really enjoy my stay there, the latin team how work in the hostel was just amazing( isabella, Adza, fernanda..etc) The vibe at night so funny and superb Definitely will back again, room good for sleep at night so the voice isolation is good as the party area far from the room Not in the center but it is just 30 walk from the attractions
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Located downtown, very close to everything. Nice staff and good breakfast. They have free walking tours, a nice bar to met new people.Good wifi and super lovely staff. Even sale public transportation tickets and have good recommendations to eat.
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: When we arrived they offered us a beer, there is a very good atmosphere at the bar. The staff is very close and friendly. The rooms are very good and clean. Breakfast is good. We would go back there again.
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The People and the athmosphere was really nice. The only thing I would consider as I would be the owner is the Air conditioning right above my bed. I had a really bad cold after sleeping there one night. But it’s only a little thing you can change. All in all I would like to come back and would recommend everyone to stay there for a few days.
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We have stayed at Queen´s with a group of 24 students for the second time this year and we were not disappointed. The rooms are simple, but ok. For our students it was no problem to share the bathroom. One group was even so lucky to have an own bathroom....Our students loved to cook in the hostel´s kitchen. In the evening they played billard and met young people in the bar of the hostel. Of course, a hostel is not a hotel: You can´t expect superclean rooms and silence in the evening/night. It is a place for young people who dont´t want to spend too much money and who want to have fun. The stuff of the hostel is very friendly and patient. If there is any problem you can ask.IFor us it was very important that Queen hostel is so close to the absolute centre. You can reach the cathedral in 15 o 20 minutes on foot.
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Our stay was ok. We didn’t spend so much time in the hostel cause we were walking around the city, but our room (only females) was fine. The breakfast could be better, but they have a kitchen where you can cook. The staff was kind. And if you don’t know what to do, there are tv, computer and games and also a beer party.PS: Idk in other rooms, but in ours, in the shower you have to leave the tap open and wait like 5 min for the hot water
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The staff are friendly n helpful. There is a bar inside, you can enjoy the warm atmosphere.... But the hostel is 40 minutes by walk from Central Station. There is a welcome drink when check in, to make you so surprised.....
hotelName:
27    Queen Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is very good but it was impossible to sleep in here. I heard the tramway all night long, vibration and noise, as if the window was open. A nightmare. Otherwise, The breakfast was perfect and service too.
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We made a room reservation with the express request of a quiet and secluded room.We were given a room next to the elevator!however, they soon corrected the mistake and moved us to a slightly better room on the sixth floor, but not down the hall as we had requested.At 3 am an Italian couple came screaming in the hallway waking everyone up!Finally, it was a bad experience at this hotel, as we arrived at 11am, so they had plenty of time to prepare a room suitable for our request, but they did not.
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great hotel. Nice room and good breakfast. Would like to have a gym there, but it was possible to go for a run a in neighbouring park. Good connections to city centre and central station. great service and a nice bar.
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A great place to stay in Milan in the city business center. My son and I were in transit from Florence and this was a great location close to Milano Centrale station from where we were both leaving the next day. Buffet breakfast great and catered to my coeliac /gluten free needs. Bravo!
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I can't say enough about this hotel. The location is wonderful. It's close to the Metro and in a very quiet neighborhood. The breakfast is amazing, the staff is courteous and professional, the rooms are nicely decorated and comfortable, and housekeeping does an excellent job. This is my 3rd time staying here and will continue to do so anytime I'm in Milan.
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Our room was a junior suite in room 724. This was a perfect room, being on a corner, with 2 windows overlooking the streets with trees. The bathroom was very generous, with a walk in double shower. The breakfast had all cereals, yoghurts, eggs, bacon sausages etc. Coffee and teas extensive. The location was excellent. 200m to metro, 20 min walk to Centrale or 25 to Garibaldi. A walk to the old town (Duomo) was through district Brera. Also close was Corso Como walking to Isola. So I would recommend staying at the Windsor. 2 galleries that are different ... MUDEC and Pirelli Hangar Boccoco.
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Staff was friendly and accommodating.Public transportation from this location was superb. Stores were within walking distance. ATM for Euros nearby. Desk staff always willing to provide directions and call a taxi. Breakfast was absolutely delicious and with a large variety of options.
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed at the Windsor for my 4th visit. Love the location, the rooms, staff are very friendly and helpful. Hotel is close to Repubblica undergroud which you can get from Milano Centrale if you dont want to walk
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stay at The Windsor at least once a month and am always extremely happy with my stay. The bedrooms are beautifully appointed, the service is outstanding and the food offered in Clotilde Bistrot is simply first class!
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My reason to give only 3 stars is because this is definitely not good for family people especially who have got small kids. Rooms are cleaned nicely. The minibar consists of just water bottles and 2 cans. The hotel won’t provide you with a kettle in the room when it’s important when you need to prepare milk including cleaning bottles. Secondly, the hotel don’t provide an iron in the room due to fire safety. You have to go downstairs if you want to use the hotel iron. You also have to go downstairs for coffee or tea or order through room service which then is expensive as tax is added. If your a morning tea or coffee lover you wont get any tea or coffee in your room because of no kettle, coffee or tea facilities provided in the rooms. Night staff Anthony was good and morning staff don’t know the lads name Asian speaks English he was really helpful and very friendly. I wont stay again especially as got got young kids. Hotel need to more specific with prices of everything and what’s included.
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at this property for 2 nights after flying into Italy. The hotel itself is very clean and has it's little quirks around the place which add character and surprisingly made you feel comfortable being there. The rooms were spacious, clean and tidy. Breakfast was pretty decent compared to other hotels around Italy, this property had an abundance of pastry items as well as a basic range of continental items. The hotel is in close proximity to public transport - no more than a 5 minute walk. Overall a great stay!
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is conveniently located, right in front of the tram. Taxis are easily available in the area. The hotel itself is very clean and tastefully decorated. The staff was very helpful with any questions I had, and went above the call of duty to assist. I will definitely stay at this hotel during my next visit to Milan!
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We really enjoyed our stay at Windsor Hotel Milano. The staff was friendly and helpful. The room was clean, very big and comfortable. We did not have one of the newly renovated rooms but it still was nicely decorated, clean and well-maintained. The beds were great. The breakfast was wonderful with a lot of choices. The location of the hotel is very good and close to public transport but also walkable to the city center and main train station. I would definitely stay their again.
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Overall great experience but one thing I would suggest is for the staff at the breakfast place to not be so rude, impatient and appearing like they don't want to .be there. Stop throwing the silverware, plates, coffee cups so loud. People are here to enjoy themselves not to see your frustation with your job. If you don't like working there I'm sure there are other people who would.
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Small hotel in good location for exploring Milan. We walked from Centro Station with our suitcases and it took about 20 minutes. We paid in advance and got a great earlybird deal which made it a reasonable option. Our room showed a little sign of wear and tear with scuff marks and rips in the wall paper in the entry hallway but was very clean and comfortable. King size bed and really good block out blinds. Small bathroom corner shower a little tight but good lighting for application of makeup. Breakfast included in the price some hot foods in warmers but mainly Continental - cereals, fruit yogurts,pastries,cheeses and pies meats. Staff helpful at sorting out issue with friends booking which had been canceled without notification by Agoda offering them a discount on current rack rate in only available room which had recently been renovated and was quite lovely. The Windsor had a good local vibe and I would recommend for short stay.
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The room we stayed in was very nice, and the maids were very good at keeping it clean daily. Nice breakfast as well.The location was great, with close proximity to tram, metro and grocery store(open 24hours a day).
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We booked this hotel for our honeymoon.First time staying here but sure not the last one.Fantastic hospitality, amazing room, giant bed , amazing location.Close to city centre. All you need is “around the corner” (pharmacy,shops,coffee bar ,Restaurants, 3 stops from Duomo) .Amazing staff, on point in every situation ,warm ,kind and doing amazing job. Next visit to Milan we know where we will stay .High recommendation .you won’t be sorry if you choose this hotel.
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great place with convenient services close to the central area. Wifi is fast and rooms are very spacious. Hotel staff is very helpful and professional. Buffet breakfast has a large selection with excellent quality.
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel itself was good - clean, great bar and restaurant, comfortable rooms; and the staff were great! The gentleman at the front desk who seemed to be hotel clerk, concierge and manager all-in-one provided assistance and answers to almost every question! The bar and restaurant staff were engaging, friendly yet professional remembering names and previous orders. Would definitely return on a future visit!
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We were upgraded to a suite, probably because we were staying 9 nights. It was important to spend our time in a facility of more space. Our only shortcoming was forgetting to introduce ourselves as hotel guests in the dining room where a 10% discount was in effect.
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: in almost best place in Milano, not too big, but friendly and humoristic staff offering good breakfast morning after morning. Cleaning is positively well done. Only minus is minimum space for two luggages - at least in our room. And AC did not work at all
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Probably the worst experience I have had in my travels till date... Firstly had a small niggle with my bookings because of a death in the family we had to postpone our travel dates to Italy, and as our bookings were all done in advance we had to make changes all the other hotels during the trip agreed to make the changes for us without a charge barring this hotel (last hotel in the 12 day trip) which was fair as I had made the bookings knowing the terms. We checked and requested for the rates for extension for the last 2 nights. Night 1: Room #422 The air conditioning barely working we somehow made it through the night. Next day when we complained we were told "our thermostat was set at 22° which was high and we are setting it to 18°" after another 30 mins nothing happens we go and complain at the reception and are told that "it's not a refrigerator that it will instantly cool it will take time" however it was untolarable in the room and after dinner we again made a complaint and this time the same person at the reception says we can choose another room and are shown 2 rooms and we choose 1 where we felt the air conditioning was working fine. Night 2: Room #528 the room was considerably cooler and we had a goods night's rest. In the morning we realised that the bed was making funny squeaking sounds, As we had a long day we did not pay too much attention to it. Night 4: After we got back the bed felt broken and we made a complaint to the reception (different staff) and when we got back in the evening from a tiring and hot day trip to Lake Como our key cards did not work and we went to check at the reception they told us that our rooms have again been changed as that bed is broken, at 11 pm we had to again move our baggage to room number# 724 and we had an early check out. For all this trouble we were offered 2 complimentary drinks by the hotel. Does not deserve to call itself a 4* property. Having to pay as much as we did for this hotel and the behaviour and language was totally unprofessional and nothing like what we experienced anywhere in the whole of Italy. A bad after taste in the mouth after an otherwise awesome trip.
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location is not too far from Milan train station. We walked from the train station to the hotel. Easy transportation to main mall.The staff is kind. The room is roomy but not for elderly. Did not have time to have breakfast.
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Our room was an older style, and a little tired, in need of updating and the shower in particular needs attention, mouldy and not appealing at all. We arrived relatively late in the afternoon and decided to dine in the restaurant -what a huge mistake. I have some dietary requirements and when I made a request to our non Italian waiter, I was told this is what they eat here! How rude! The result was that I could only eat 1/4 of the meat I had ordered and nothing else. The salad went back to the kitchen untouched, the greens inedible and dry/wilted. The bread we were presented with was dry and if I had t9 guess it could have been the left overs from breakfast, this was also not eaten. At no stage did the waiter ask if everything was okay and there was no question as to why most of my food went back at the end of our meal. We then refused desserts as I was not prepared to attempt after a terrible meal. Breakfast the next morning. Was slightly improved but not really up to par. The bread was fresher than the night before. Ask for the fresh coffee, the coffee in the urn is awful.
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: If you are traveling with a group, hey do everything possible to make your stay smooth. We were able to check in early the day of our arrival as all the rooms were ready. That was so helpful so that we didn;t have to wait until late in the day to get possession of the room.
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: They had a great Aperol spritz and breakfast was soo yummy! I defiantly will go back. Also will recommend to my friends. Oh, from hotel to central station is only 13 minutes. Easy walk and area is safe. We walked after 2200, I feel safe.
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very nice Milan hotel. Good location - walkable from the train station and close to metro lines. Breakfast was very good. I've stayed here a couple of times already and would definitely come back if the opportunity arises.
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I have stayed in this hotel with my mom. It is my second visit to Milan. Last time I stayed close to the train station and I like this area much better than the train station area. The hotel is very nice for the value you pay . The rooms are nice and quiet. Our room had a window to the main street but it was well isolated and we had a very nice sleep. The reception staff are very helpful to guide you to visit the city. The breakfast was very good. I enjoyed drinking real cappucino evry morning. The location is more than perfect. You have several trams passing by the hotel. the tram station is just outside of the hotel and the metro is 5 min walk.
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The rooms are quite spacious and have everything you need to guarantee a pleasant stay. The breakfast buffet offers anything you like from sweet to salted, fruits, yoghurts, ... The hotel is located at a 10 minutes walk from the central station and near the metro station of Republicca but you can also reach the city centre by walking. The nearby Porta Nuova area and Brega offer nice shops and restaurants so the hotel is really well situated. The hotel staff is friendly and helpful.It was my second stay at the hotel and I will definitely go back a third time.
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is a hotel that claims it has a 4 star rating. After my disappointing experience, I recommend future travellers to just book an airbnb. 1. Noisy room - sound of tram passing by & house keeper vacuuming at 8:30am2. Rude staff during breakfast, refuse to clear our plates & ALL staff had a grumpy face throughout. Not even a greeting from them3. Average quality food, not a very wide variety4. My room's door frame was falling off
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Room is very clear , spacious, luxury with bathroom knit n clean. Property near to Central station, very comfortable.Budget friendly, nice restaurant , Indian restaurant very near by. Lift a bit noisy, small but overall hotel experience is nice.
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We have stayed over the weekend from friday to monday. We have enjoyed our stay at the windsor hotel. The rooms were nice and they always smelled amazing! They were clean and quite big. The bathroom was nice as well. We have booked it with breakfast. The buffet was okay nothing too exciting. I liked the location of the hotel as it is only three metro stops away from the duomo. I would come back to this hotel.
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here for 3 nights end of April/May 2019. Took the train from airport and the exit from the Metro to the hotel is only a few hundred meters away. So you can use the metro to other destinations. The Metro is also so easy to use. Use your contactless credit/debit card if you do not want to queue up for the tickets. Check in was so quick, I think was less than 10 minutes. We arrived before check in time and was happy that the room was ready and we could check in. Access to the elevators required key cards, so safety is good. The room looks small, but cosy and comfortable. Large windows overlooking the street and some views. Bed is comfortable, soft pillows. Working desk with a really huge TV. The bathroom is properly equipped, good water pressure also. Breakfast was ok, not much choices, mostly bread, scrambled eggs, sausages and fruits, but the food is delicious !! The restaurant is shared with walk in customers, no issues there though. Had dinner at the restaurant on the last night, food was really really good. I noticed many customers also.Ooh noticed one thing bout the air conditioning, it was not really cold enough even when temperature was set to 19c. Would not hesitate to stay here again.Thank you.
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed 3 nights end of April after a long backpacking trip around Europe.The hotel is located a short walk from the Metro. Restaurants and a supermarket nearby. Check in was so fast, received the keys to the room in less than 10 minutes.The room is small but cosy and comfortable. Comfortable beds and pillows, shower with good water pressure and amenities. Wifi was really fast and reliable. Breakfast was ok, not much choices, but good quality food. Had dinner at the restaurant on the last night, food was really good too.Would definitely stay here again if I were to go back to Milan.Thank you!!
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The staff, particularly in the restaurant made my stay at the Windsor feel like a home away from home. I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again. It was located close to what I needed and a short walk to the Brera district and Corso Como.
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My wife and I stayed at the hotel for 3 days. The room is clean, quiet and with new furnishings. The staff members are helpful and friendly and speak English well. The hotel is within 10 mins mutes walk to the subway stations and only a 10-Euro taxi ride to the Duomo area. The complementary buffet breakfast is AWESOME! It’s an excellent hotel!
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I would recommend this hotel. Room was small for 2 big suitcases but no other complaints. Staff was professional and very helpful. Excellent location very close to transportation and easy walk to good restaurants
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice hotel close to many offices, but also close to the city centre.,Friendly staff in the reception and in the restaurant. The restaurant has good food and a very relaxed atmosphere. No gym or pool unfortunately. It was also a kind of busy street so I had some noise when trying to sleep.
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My room was really clear, breakfast very good, the Hotel is well located. I high recommend it!! The staff specially at the reception speaks in English an is also friendly. I feel happy to recommend this place. definitely a good choice.
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Ambulance noise is very disturbing each night, I think there is a hospital close by. Water flow rate in the shower was slow and we had difficulty. Other than those, it was a great experience to stay in this hotel.
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Currently staying here on our Europe trip for 3 nights.Pros:Good location as only about 10-15 mins walk from Central. Also tram and metro easily accessible.Carrefour supermarket is also 2 minsFor duamo you can walk about 25 mins ,nice walk or take tramCons:Front of staff lacks customer service, when we were checking in one person kept hopping from one computer to the other completely ignoring us and we were right in front of him at the reception.No greetings, hello or how are you just a robotic " I need you passport and a credit card" no explanation what the credit card is needed for. Just handed us 2 identical keys ,one for the lifts and one for the room which is the first hotel that has this system.Bathroom is very poor design, the shower cubical is way too small we are considered skinny and had to be careful as there was no space in the cubical. If you are large please make sure you fit in the shower so you don't hurt yourself.Room walls are very thin, we can here next room conversation( they are on there phone now..lol ),their phone ringing and early morning snoring.Breakfast is ok but there are no labels on what that item is so guess and eatOverall just ok good for location, however would not choose this hotel next time. Better hotels with better customer service available within same vacinity in the same price range.Tip:Citylife restaurant near Milano Central , 10 mins from hotel is cheap and nice with big varity of pizza, pasta and outdoor dining
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great Hotel, with nice people, rooms are wonderful... very new and cleaned, BF is great, very nice location 2KM (Max) for mais attractions.Very nice place to stay with family, business and others... i recommend.
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Not many hotels near milano station but this one beats many. Clean comfortable, excellent room service and breakfast in the bistrot. Quiet clean room, ENORMOUS bathroom. Worth every penny! Lovely pictures along the corridors and of course friendly staff.
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: All necessary near at hotel - more restaurant and bars, historical centre, metro, bus station, central station ect.Good value for room, not bad breakfast, helpful personal.Fot 3-4 days - it is excellent hotel
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My boyfriend was here on business and I came along for vacation. Our room was in front - on a busy street, with police, trains and the trolley. I think Milan (maybe Italy?) has a system that does not allow you to lower the heat below 18 degrees Celsius? We would open the window for fresh air but when the railway crew is outside pounding on the rails at 1-2 am...you have to close the window to drown out the noise. The staff were amazing - in the hotel and in the restaurant. One female barista, however, was not so nice. You encounter this sort of attitude all over, so I just laughed and let it slide. The beds were nice and the bathroom was large. The shower was small but did the trick! We didn’t spend a lot of time in the room. We needed more hangers for our dress clothes and the staff were happy and swift to oblige. There are no drawers for clothes for longer visits. Perhaps on the other side of the hotel and in the suites? We were too busy outside of the hotel to care too much about the lack of clothes storage space. It is close to the train station and close to where a few tours depart from (Zani Viaggi, for example). Excellent location.
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good location, close to Piazza Rwpiblocca and metro train station - walkable (about 20 mins) to the main part of city of Milan, clean and comfortable room with a varied and excellent breakfast. Sound proofing not amazing so heard people speaking / footsteps outside room door quite easily. Wouldn’t hesitate to recommend.
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I can just just say - Visit this Hotel a perfect starting point when visit Milano.The staff was very professional and friendly. The restaurant made good meals and service.The breakfrist was a good start of the day -
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: If you are very particular about cleanliness especially bathroom hygiene then this hotel is the best option for a four star hotel. Price was reasonable; contemporary style room which was spotless and breakfast was decent.
hotelName:
28    Windsor Hotel Milano
